239 
251 static uint8_t a_mpu6500_read(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t reg, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
252 {
253  if (handle->iic_spi == MPU6500_INTERFACE_IIC) /* if iic interface */
254  {
255  if (handle->iic_read(handle->iic_addr, reg, (uint8_t *)buf, len) != 0) /* read data */
256  {
257  return 1; /* return error */
258  }
259  else
260  {
261  return 0; /* success return 0 */
262  }
263  }
264  else /* spi interface */
265  {
266  if (handle->spi_read(reg | 0x80, (uint8_t *)buf, len) != 0) /* read data */
267  {
268  return 1; /* return error */
269  }
270  else
271  {
272  return 0; /* success return 0 */
273  }
274  }
275 }
276 
288 static uint8_t a_mpu6500_write(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t reg, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
289 {
290  if (handle->iic_spi == MPU6500_INTERFACE_IIC) /* if iic interface */
291  {
292  if (handle->iic_write(handle->iic_addr, reg, (uint8_t *)buf, len) != 0) /* write data */
293  {
294  return 1; /* return error */
295  }
296  else
297  {
298  return 0; /* success return 0 */
299  }
300  }
301  else /* spi interface */
302  {
303  if (handle->spi_write(reg & (~0x80), (uint8_t *)buf, len) != 0) /* write data */
304  {
305  return 1; /* return error */
306  }
307  else
308  {
309  return 0; /* success return 0 */
310  }
311  }
312 }
313 
326 static uint8_t a_mpu6500_write_mem(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t addr, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
327 {
328  uint8_t tmp[2];
329 
330  tmp[0] = (addr >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set the addr high */
331  tmp[1] = (addr >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set the addr low */
332 
333  if (tmp[1] + len > 256) /* check the range */
334  {
335  return 2; /* return error */
336  }
337 
338  if (handle->iic_spi == MPU6500_INTERFACE_IIC) /* if iic interface */
339  {
340  if (handle->iic_write(handle->iic_addr, MPU6500_REG_BANK_SEL, (uint8_t *)tmp, 2) != 0) /* write data */
341  {
342  return 1; /* return error */
343  }
344  if (handle->iic_write(handle->iic_addr, MPU6500_REG_MEM, (uint8_t *)buf, len) != 0) /* write data */
345  {
346  return 1; /* return error */
347  }
348  }
349  else /* if spi interface */
350  {
351  if (handle->spi_write(MPU6500_REG_BANK_SEL & (~0x80), (uint8_t *)tmp, 2) != 0) /* write data */
352  {
353  return 1; /* return error */
354  }
355  if (handle->spi_write(MPU6500_REG_MEM & (~0x80), (uint8_t *)buf, len) != 0) /* write data */
356  {
357  return 1; /* return error */
358  }
359  }
360 
361  return 0; /* success return 0 */
362 }
363 
376 static uint8_t a_mpu6500_read_mem(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t addr, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
377 {
378  uint8_t tmp[2];
379 
380  tmp[0] = (addr >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set the addr high */
381  tmp[1] = (addr >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set the addr low */
382 
383  if (tmp[1] + len > 256) /* check the range */
384  {
385  return 2; /* return error */
386  }
387 
388  if (handle->iic_spi == MPU6500_INTERFACE_IIC) /* if iic interface */
389  {
390  if (handle->iic_write(handle->iic_addr, MPU6500_REG_BANK_SEL, (uint8_t *)tmp, 2) != 0) /* write data */
391  {
392  return 1; /* return error */
393  }
394  if (handle->iic_read(handle->iic_addr, MPU6500_REG_MEM, (uint8_t *)buf, len) != 0) /* read data */
395  {
396  return 1; /* return error */
397  }
398  }
399  else /* if spi interface */
400  {
401  if (handle->spi_write(MPU6500_REG_BANK_SEL & (~0x80), (uint8_t *)tmp, 2) != 0) /* write data */
402  {
403  return 1; /* return error */
404  }
405  if (handle->spi_read(MPU6500_REG_MEM | 0x80, (uint8_t *)buf, len) != 0) /* read data */
406  {
407  return 1; /* return error */
408  }
409  }
410 
411  return 0; /* success return 0 */
412 }
413 
421 static uint8_t a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(mpu6500_handle_t *handle)
422 {
423  uint8_t res;
424  uint8_t prev;
425  uint8_t int_enable;
426  uint8_t fifo_enable;
427  uint8_t user_ctrl;
428 
429  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_ENABLE, &int_enable, 1); /* read the int enable */
430  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
431  {
432  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read int enable register failed.\n"); /* read int enable register failed */
433 
434  return 1; /* return error */
435  }
436  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, &fifo_enable, 1); /* read the fifo enable */
437  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
438  {
439  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read fifo enable register failed.\n"); /* read fifo enable register failed */
440 
441  return 1; /* return error */
442  }
443  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, &user_ctrl, 1); /* read the user ctrl */
444  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
445  {
446  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl register failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl register failed */
447 
448  return 1; /* return error */
449  }
450 
451  prev = 0; /* set 0 */
452  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_ENABLE, &prev, 1); /* disable all interrupt */
453  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
454  {
455  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write int enable register failed.\n"); /* write int enable register failed */
456 
457  return 1; /* return error */
458  }
459  prev = 0; /* set 0 */
460  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, &prev, 1); /* disable all fifo */
461  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
462  {
463  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write fifo enable register failed.\n"); /* write fifo enable register failed */
464 
465  return 1; /* return error */
466  }
467  user_ctrl &= ~(1 << 6); /* disable the fifo */
468  user_ctrl &= ~(1 << 7); /* disable the dmp */
469  if (handle->dmp_inited == 1) /* if we use dmp */
470  {
471  user_ctrl |= (1 << 2) | (1 << 3); /* reset the fifo and dmp */
472  }
473  else
474  {
475  user_ctrl |= 1 << 2; /* reset the fifo */
476  }
477  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, &user_ctrl, 1); /* write the user ctrl */
478  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
479  {
480  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write user ctrl register failed.\n"); /* write user ctrl register failed */
481 
482  return 1; /* return error */
483  }
484  handle->delay_ms(50); /* delay 50 ms */
485  if (handle->dmp_inited == 1) /* if we use dmp */
486  {
487  user_ctrl |= (1 << 6) | (1 << 7); /* enable fifo and dmp */
488  }
489  else
490  {
491  user_ctrl |= 1 << 6; /* enable fifo */
492  }
493  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, &user_ctrl, 1); /* write the user ctrl */
494  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
495  {
496  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write user ctrl register failed.\n"); /* write user ctrl register failed */
497 
498  return 1; /* return error */
499  }
500 
501  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_ENABLE, &int_enable, 1); /* restore the int enable */
502  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
503  {
504  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write int enable register failed.\n"); /* write int enable register failed */
505 
506  return 1; /* return error */
507  }
508  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, &fifo_enable, 1); /* restore the fifo enable */
509  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
510  {
511  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write fifo enable register failed.\n"); /* write fifo enable register failed */
512 
513  return 1; /* return error */
514  }
515 
516  return 0; /* success return 0 */
517 }
518 
525 static uint16_t a_mpu6500_inv_row_2_scale(int8_t *row)
526 {
527  uint16_t b;
528 
529  if (row[0] > 0) /* check row 0 */
530  {
531  b = 0; /* set 0 */
532  }
533  else if (row[0] < 0) /* check row 0 */
534  {
535  b = 4; /* set 4 */
536  }
537  else if (row[1] > 0) /* check row 1 */
538  {
539  b = 1; /* set 1 */
540  }
541  else if (row[1] < 0) /* check row 1 */
542  {
543  b = 5; /* set 5 */
544  }
545  else if (row[2] > 0) /* check row 2 */
546  {
547  b = 2; /* set 2 */
548  }
549  else if (row[2] < 0) /* check row 2 */
550  {
551  b = 6; /* set 6 */
552  }
553  else
554  {
555  b = 7; /* set 7 */
556  }
557 
558  return b; /* return scale */
559 }
560 
567 static uint16_t a_mpu6500_inv_orientation_matrix_to_scalar(int8_t *mtx)
568 {
569  uint16_t scalar;
570 
571  scalar = a_mpu6500_inv_row_2_scale(mtx); /* convert the part 0 */
572  scalar |= a_mpu6500_inv_row_2_scale(mtx + 3) << 3; /* convert the part 1 */
573  scalar |= a_mpu6500_inv_row_2_scale(mtx + 6) << 6; /* convert the part 2 */
574 
575  return scalar; /* return the scalar */
576 }
577 
583 static void a_mpu6500_dmp_decode_gesture(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t gesture[4])
584 {
585  uint8_t tap;
586  uint8_t orient;
587 
588  orient = gesture[3] & 0xC0; /* set the orient */
589  tap = 0x3F & gesture[3]; /* set the tap */
590  if ((gesture[1] & MPU6500_DMP_INT_SRC_TAP) != 0) /* check the tap output */
591  {
592  uint8_t direction, count;
593 
594  direction = tap >> 3; /* get the direction */
595  count = (tap % 8) + 1; /* get the count */
596  if (handle->dmp_tap_callback != NULL) /* check the dmp tap callback */
597  {
598  handle->dmp_tap_callback(direction, count); /* run the dmp tap callback */
599  }
600  }
601  if ((gesture[1] & MPU6500_DMP_INT_SRC_ORIENT) != 0) /* check the orient output */
602  {
603  if (handle->dmp_orient_callback != NULL) /* check the dmp orient callback */
604  {
605  handle->dmp_orient_callback(orient >> 6); /* run the dmp orient callback */
606  }
607  }
608 }
609 
620 static uint8_t a_mpu6500_accel_self_test(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int32_t *bias_regular, int32_t *bias_st)
621 {
622  uint8_t res;
623  uint8_t i;
624  uint8_t otp_value_zero;
625  uint8_t regs[3];
626  float accel_st_al_min;
627  float accel_st_al_max;
628  float accel_offset_max;
629  float st_shift_cust[3];
630  float st_shift_ratio[3];
631  float ct_shift_prod[3];
632 
633  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_SELF_TEST_X_ACCEL, regs, 3); /* read the tmp */
634  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
635  {
636  return 1; /* return error */
637  }
638 
639  otp_value_zero = 0;
640  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) /* 3 times */
641  {
642  if (regs[i] != 0) /* check the regs */
643  {
644  ct_shift_prod[i] = (float)gs_st_tb[regs[i] - 1]; /* get the table */
645  ct_shift_prod[i] *= 65536.f; /* x65535.0f */
646  ct_shift_prod[i] /= 16384.0f; /* 2g */
647  }
648  else
649  {
650  ct_shift_prod[i] = 0.0f; /* init 0.0f */
651  otp_value_zero = 1; /* check otp value zero */
652  }
653  }
654  if (otp_value_zero == 0) /* check otp value zero */
655  {
656  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) /* 3 times */
657  {
658  st_shift_cust[i] = (float)(bias_st[i] - bias_regular[i]); /* set the shift cust */
659  st_shift_ratio[i] = st_shift_cust[i] / ct_shift_prod[i] - 1.f; /* set the shift ratio */
660  if (fabsf(st_shift_ratio[i]) > 0.5f) /* check the shift ratio */
661  {
662  return 1; /* return error */
663  }
664  }
665  }
666  else
667  {
668  accel_st_al_min = 0.225f * 65536.f; /* set the st al min */
669  accel_st_al_max = 0.675f * 65536.f; /* set the st al max */
670  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) /* 3 times */
671  {
672  st_shift_cust[i] = (float)(bias_st[i] - bias_regular[i]); /* shift cust */
673  if (st_shift_cust[i] < accel_st_al_min
674  || st_shift_cust[i] > accel_st_al_max) /* check the result */
675  {
676  return 1; /* return error */
677  }
678  }
679  }
680 
681  accel_offset_max = 0.5f * 65536.f; /* set the offset max */
682  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) /* 3 times */
683  {
684  if (fabsf((float)bias_regular[i]) > accel_offset_max) /* check offset */
685  {
686  return 1; /* return error */
687  }
688  }
689 
690  return 0; /* success return 0 */
691 }
692 
703 static uint8_t a_mpu6500_gyro_self_test(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int32_t *bias_regular, int32_t *bias_st)
704 {
705  uint8_t res;
706  uint8_t i;
707  uint8_t otp_value_zero;
708  float gyro_st_al_max;
709  float gyro_offset_max;
710  float st_shift_cust[3];
711  float st_shift_ratio[3];
712  float ct_shift_prod[3];
713  uint8_t regs[3];
714 
715  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_SELF_TEST_X_GYRO, regs, 3); /* read the tmp */
716  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
717  {
718  return 1; /* return error */
719  }
720 
721  otp_value_zero = 0; /* init otp value zero 0.0f */
722  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) /* 3 times */
723  {
724  if (regs[i] != 0) /* check regs */
725  {
726  ct_shift_prod[i] = (float)gs_st_tb[regs[i] - 1]; /* set shift prod */
727  ct_shift_prod[i] *= 65536.f; /* x65536.0f */
728  ct_shift_prod[i] /= 131.0f; /* 250dps */
729  }
730  else
731  {
732  ct_shift_prod[i] = 0; /* init 0.0f */
733  otp_value_zero = 1; /* set otp value zero 1 */
734  }
735  }
736 
737  if (otp_value_zero == 0) /* if otp value zero == 0 */
738  {
739  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) /* 3 times */
740  {
741  st_shift_cust[i] = (float)(bias_st[i] - bias_regular[i]); /* shift cust */
742  st_shift_ratio[i] = st_shift_cust[i] / ct_shift_prod[i]; /* shift ratio */
743  if (fabsf(st_shift_ratio[i]) < 0.5f) /* check ratio */
744  {
745  return 1; /* return error */
746  }
747  }
748  }
749  else
750  {
751  gyro_st_al_max = 60.f * 65536.f; /* set st al max */
752  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) /* 3 times */
753  {
754  st_shift_cust[i] = (float)(bias_st[i] - bias_regular[i]); /* set cust */
755  if (st_shift_cust[i] < gyro_st_al_max) /* check st al max */
756  {
757  return 1; /* return error */
758  }
759  }
760  }
761 
762  gyro_offset_max = 20.f * 65536.f; /* set gyro offset max */
763  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) /* 3 times */
764  {
765  if( fabsf((float)bias_regular[i]) > gyro_offset_max) /* check gyro offset max */
766  {
767  return 1; /* return error */
768  }
769  }
770 
771  return 0; /* success return 0 */
772 }
773 
785 static uint8_t a_mpu6500_get_st_biases(mpu6500_handle_t *handle,
786  int32_t gyro_offset[3], int32_t accel_offset[3],
787  uint8_t hw_test_enable)
788 {
789  uint8_t res;
790  uint16_t cnt;
791  uint16_t pack_cnt;
792  uint16_t i;
793  uint8_t data[12];
794 
795  data[0] = 0x01; /* set 0x01 */
796  data[1] = 0x00; /* set 0x00 */
797  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, data, 2); /* write pwr mgmt1 */
798  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
799  {
800  return 1; /* return error */
801  }
802  handle->delay_ms(200); /* delay 200ms */
803  data[0] = 0; /* set 0 */
804  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_ENABLE, data, 1); /* write int enable */
805  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
806  {
807  return 1; /* return error */
808  }
809  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, data, 1); /* write the fifo enable */
810  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
811  {
812  return 1; /* return error */
813  }
814  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, data, 1); /* write the pwr mgmt 1 */
815  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
816  {
817  return 1; /* return error */
818  }
819  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, data, 1); /* write the i2c mst ctrl */
820  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
821  {
822  return 1; /* return error */
823  }
824  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, data, 1); /* write the user ctrl */
825  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
826  {
827  return 1; /* return error */
828  }
829 
830  data[0] = 1 << 3 | 1 << 2; /* set fifo and dmp reset */
831  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, data, 1); /* write user ctrl */
832  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
833  {
834  return 1; /* return error */
835  }
836  handle->delay_ms(15); /* delay 15 ms */
837  data[0] = 0x01; /* set 0x01 */
838  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_CONFIG, data, 1); /* write config */
839  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
840  {
841  return 1; /* return error */
842  }
843  data[0] = 0x00; /* set 0 */
844  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_SMPRT_DIV, data, 1); /* write div */
845  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
846  {
847  return 1; /* return error */
848  }
849  if (hw_test_enable != 0) /* if enable */
850  {
851  data[0] = 0x00 | 0xE0; /* set 250dps and test */
852  }
853  else
854  {
855  data[0] = 0x00; /* set 250dps */
856  }
857  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_GYRO_CONFIG, data, 1); /* read the gyro config */
858  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
859  {
860  return 1; /* return error */
861  }
862  if (hw_test_enable != 0) /* if enable */
863  {
864  data[0] = 0x18 | 0xE0; /* enable 2g and test */
865  }
866  else
867  {
868  data[0] = 0x18; /* enable 2g */
869  }
870  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_ACCEL_CONFIG, data, 1); /* read the accel config */
871  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
872  {
873  return 1; /* return error */
874  }
875  if (hw_test_enable != 0) /* if enable */
876  {
877  handle->delay_ms(200); /* delay 200ms */
878  }
879 
880  data[0] = 1 << 6; /* enable fifo */
881  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, data, 1); /* write user ctrl */
882  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
883  {
884  return 1; /* return error */
885  }
886  data[0] = 0x78; /* enable xyz */
887  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, data, 1); /* write fifo enable */
888  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
889  {
890  return 1; /* return error */
891  }
892  handle->delay_ms(50); /* delay 50 ms */
893  data[0] = 0x00; /* set disable */
894  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, data, 1); /* write fifo enable */
895  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
896  {
897  return 1; /* return error */
898  }
899 
900  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_COUNTH, data, 2); /* read fifo counter */
901  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
902  {
903  return 1; /* return error */
904  }
905  cnt = ((uint16_t)data[0] << 8) | data[1]; /* set the counter */
906  pack_cnt = cnt / 12; /* set the packet counter */
907 
908  gyro_offset[0] = 0; /* gyro offset 0 */
909  gyro_offset[1] = 0; /* gyro offset 1 */
910  gyro_offset[2] = 0; /* gyro offset 2 */
911  accel_offset[0] = 0; /* accel offset 0 */
912  accel_offset[1] = 0; /* accel offset 1 */
913  accel_offset[2] = 0; /* accel offset 2 */
914  for (i = 0; i < pack_cnt; i++) /* packet counter */
915  {
916  int16_t accel_cur[3];
917  int16_t gyro_cur[3];
918 
919  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_R_W, data, 12); /* read data */
920  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
921  {
922  return 1; /* return error */
923  }
924 
925  accel_cur[0] = ((int16_t)data[0] << 8) | data[1]; /* accel cur 0 */
926  accel_cur[1] = ((int16_t)data[2] << 8) | data[3]; /* accel cur 1 */
927  accel_cur[2] = ((int16_t)data[4] << 8) | data[5]; /* accel cur 2 */
928  accel_offset[0] += (int32_t)accel_cur[0]; /* accel offset 0 */
929  accel_offset[1] += (int32_t)accel_cur[1]; /* accel offset 1 */
930  accel_offset[2] += (int32_t)accel_cur[2]; /* accel offset 2 */
931  gyro_cur[0] = (((int16_t)data[6] << 8) | data[7]); /* gyro cur 0 */
932  gyro_cur[1] = (((int16_t)data[8] << 8) | data[9]); /* gyro cur 1 */
933  gyro_cur[2] = (((int16_t)data[10] << 8) | data[11]); /* gyro cur 2 */
934  gyro_offset[0] += (int32_t)gyro_cur[0]; /* gyro offset 0 */
935  gyro_offset[1] += (int32_t)gyro_cur[1]; /* gyro offset 1 */
936  gyro_offset[2] += (int32_t)gyro_cur[2]; /* gyro offset 2 */
937  }
938 
939  gyro_offset[0] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)gyro_offset[0] << 16) / (32768 / 250) / pack_cnt); /* set the gyro offset 0 */
940  gyro_offset[1] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)gyro_offset[1] << 16) / (32768 / 250) / pack_cnt); /* set the gyro offset 1 */
941  gyro_offset[2] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)gyro_offset[2] << 16) / (32768 / 250) / pack_cnt); /* set the gyro offset 2 */
942  accel_offset[0] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)accel_offset[0] << 16) / (32768 / 16) / pack_cnt); /* set the accel offset 0 */
943  accel_offset[1] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)accel_offset[1] << 16) / (32768 / 16) / pack_cnt); /* set the accel offset 1 */
944  accel_offset[2] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)accel_offset[2] << 16) / (32768 / 16) / pack_cnt); /* set the accel offset 2 */
945  if (accel_offset[2] > 0L) /* check the accel offset */
946  {
947  accel_offset[2] -= 65536L; /* -65536 */
948  }
949  else
950  {
951  accel_offset[2] += 65536L; /* +65536 */
952  }
953 
954  return 0; /* success return 0 */
955 }
956 
965 static uint8_t a_mpu6500_deinit(mpu6500_handle_t *handle)
966 {
967  if (handle->iic_spi == MPU6500_INTERFACE_IIC) /* if iic interface */
968  {
969  if (handle->iic_deinit() != 0) /* iic deinit */
970  {
971  return 1; /* return error */
972  }
973  else
974  {
975  return 0; /* success return 0 */
976  }
977  }
978  else
979  {
980  if (handle->spi_deinit() != 0) /* if spi interface */
981  {
982  return 1; /* return error */
983  }
984  else
985  {
986  return 0; /* success return 0 */
987  }
988  }
989 }
990 
1004 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_load_firmware(mpu6500_handle_t *handle)
1005 {
1006  uint8_t res;
1007  uint16_t i;
1008  uint16_t size;
1009  uint16_t this_write;
1010  uint8_t tmp[2];
1011  uint8_t cur[16];
1012 
1013  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1014  {
1015  return 2; /* return error */
1016  }
1017  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1018  {
1019  return 3; /* return error */
1020  }
1021  if (handle->dmp_inited != 0) /* check dmp initialization */
1022  {
1023  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is running.\n"); /* dmp is running */
1024 
1025  return 4; /* return error */
1026  }
1027 
1028  size = MPU6500_DMP_CODE_SIZE; /* set the code size */
1029  for (i = 0; i < size; i += this_write) /* code size times */
1030  {
1031  this_write = MIN(16, size - i); /* get the written size */
1032 
1033  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, i, (uint8_t *)(gs_mpu6500_dmp_code + i),
1034  this_write); /* write data */
1035  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1036  {
1037  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1038 
1039  return 1; /* return error */
1040  }
1041  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, i, cur, this_write); /* read data */
1042  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1043  {
1044  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
1045 
1046  return 1; /* return error */
1047  }
1048  if (memcmp(gs_mpu6500_dmp_code + i, cur, this_write) != 0) /* check the code */
1049  {
1050  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: code compare error.\n"); /* code compare error */
1051 
1052  return 5; /* return error */
1053  }
1054  }
1055  tmp[0] = (0x0400 >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set the addr high */
1056  tmp[1] = (0x0400 >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set the addr low */
1057 
1058  if (handle->iic_write(handle->iic_addr, MPU6500_REG_PROGRAM_START,
1059  (uint8_t *)tmp, 2) != 0) /* write data */
1060  {
1061  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: set program start failed.\n"); /* set program start failed */
1062 
1063  return 6; /* return error */
1064  }
1065  handle->dmp_inited = 1; /* flag the dmp inited bit */
1066 
1067  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1068 }
1069 
1082 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_pedometer_walk_time(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint32_t ms)
1083 {
1084  uint8_t res;
1085  uint8_t tmp[4];
1086 
1087  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1088  {
1089  return 2; /* return error */
1090  }
1091  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1092  {
1093  return 3; /* return error */
1094  }
1095  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1096  {
1097  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1098 
1099  return 4; /* return error */
1100  }
1101 
1102  ms /= 20; /* div 20 */
1103  tmp[0] = (uint8_t)((ms >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set part 0 */
1104  tmp[1] = (uint8_t)((ms >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set part 1 */
1105  tmp[2] = (uint8_t)((ms >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set part 2 */
1106  tmp[3] = (uint8_t)(ms & 0xFF); /* set part 3 */
1107 
1108  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_PEDSTD_TIMECTR, tmp, 4); /* write data */
1109  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1110  {
1111  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1112 
1113  return 1; /* return error */
1114  }
1115 
1116  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1117 }
1118 
1131 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_pedometer_walk_time(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint32_t *ms)
1132 {
1133  uint8_t res;
1134  uint8_t tmp[4];
1135 
1136  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1137  {
1138  return 2; /* return error */
1139  }
1140  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1141  {
1142  return 3; /* return error */
1143  }
1144  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1145  {
1146  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1147 
1148  return 4; /* return error */
1149  }
1150 
1151  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_PEDSTD_TIMECTR, tmp, 4); /* read data */
1152  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1153  {
1154  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
1155 
1156  return 1; /* return error */
1157  }
1158  *ms = (((uint32_t)tmp[0] << 24) | ((uint32_t)tmp[1] << 16) |
1159  ((uint32_t)tmp[2] << 8) | tmp[3]) * 20; /* get the ms */
1160 
1161  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1162 }
1163 
1176 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_pedometer_step_count(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint32_t count)
1177 {
1178  uint8_t res;
1179  uint8_t tmp[4];
1180 
1181  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1182  {
1183  return 2; /* return error */
1184  }
1185  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1186  {
1187  return 3; /* return error */
1188  }
1189  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1190  {
1191  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1192 
1193  return 4; /* return error */
1194  }
1195 
1196  tmp[0] = (uint8_t)((count >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set part 0 */
1197  tmp[1] = (uint8_t)((count >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set part 1 */
1198  tmp[2] = (uint8_t)((count >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set part 2 */
1199  tmp[3] = (uint8_t)(count & 0xFF); /* set part 3 */
1200 
1201  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_PEDSTD_STEPCTR, tmp, 4); /* write data */
1202  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1203  {
1204  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1205 
1206  return 1; /* return error */
1207  }
1208 
1209  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1210 }
1211 
1224 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_pedometer_step_count(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint32_t *count)
1225 {
1226  uint8_t res;
1227  uint8_t tmp[4];
1228 
1229  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1230  {
1231  return 2; /* return error */
1232  }
1233  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1234  {
1235  return 3; /* return error */
1236  }
1237  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1238  {
1239  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1240 
1241  return 4; /* return error */
1242  }
1243 
1244  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_PEDSTD_STEPCTR, tmp, 4); /* read data */
1245  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1246  {
1247  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
1248 
1249  return 1; /* return error */
1250  }
1251  *count = (((uint32_t)tmp[0] << 24) | ((uint32_t)tmp[1] << 16) |
1252  ((uint32_t)tmp[2] << 8) | tmp[3]); /* get the ms */
1253 
1254  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1255 }
1256 
1269 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_shake_reject_timeout(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t ms)
1270 {
1271  uint8_t res;
1272  uint8_t tmp[2];
1273 
1274  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1275  {
1276  return 2; /* return error */
1277  }
1278  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1279  {
1280  return 3; /* return error */
1281  }
1282  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1283  {
1284  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1285 
1286  return 4; /* return error */
1287  }
1288 
1289  ms /= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
1290  tmp[0] = (ms >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set part 0 */
1291  tmp[1] = (ms >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set part 1 */
1292 
1293  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_88, tmp, 2); /* write data */
1294  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1295  {
1296  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1297 
1298  return 1; /* return error */
1299  }
1300 
1301  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1302 }
1303 
1316 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_shake_reject_timeout(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *ms)
1317 {
1318  uint8_t res;
1319  uint8_t tmp[2];
1320 
1321  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1322  {
1323  return 2; /* return error */
1324  }
1325  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1326  {
1327  return 3; /* return error */
1328  }
1329  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1330  {
1331  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1332 
1333  return 4; /* return error */
1334  }
1335 
1336  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_88, tmp, 2); /* read data */
1337  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1338  {
1339  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
1340 
1341  return 1; /* return error */
1342  }
1343  *ms = (uint16_t)((uint16_t)tmp[0] << 8) | tmp[1]; /* get the raw time */
1344  *ms *= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
1345 
1346  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1347 }
1348 
1361 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_shake_reject_time(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t ms)
1362 {
1363  uint8_t res;
1364  uint8_t tmp[2];
1365 
1366  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1367  {
1368  return 2; /* return error */
1369  }
1370  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1371  {
1372  return 3; /* return error */
1373  }
1374  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1375  {
1376  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1377 
1378  return 4; /* return error */
1379  }
1380 
1381  ms /= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
1382  tmp[0] = (ms >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set part 0 */
1383  tmp[1] = (ms >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set part 1 */
1384 
1385  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_90, tmp, 2); /* write data */
1386  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1387  {
1388  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1389 
1390  return 1; /* return error */
1391  }
1392 
1393  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1394 }
1395 
1408 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_shake_reject_time(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *ms)
1409 {
1410  uint8_t res;
1411  uint8_t tmp[2];
1412 
1413  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1414  {
1415  return 2; /* return error */
1416  }
1417  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1418  {
1419  return 3; /* return error */
1420  }
1421  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1422  {
1423  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1424 
1425  return 4; /* return error */
1426  }
1427 
1428  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_90, tmp, 2); /* read data */
1429  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1430  {
1431  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
1432 
1433  return 1; /* return error */
1434  }
1435  *ms = (uint16_t)((uint16_t)tmp[0] << 8) | tmp[1]; /* get the raw time */
1436  *ms *= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
1437 
1438  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1439 }
1440 
1453 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_shake_reject_thresh(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t dps)
1454 {
1455  uint8_t res;
1456  uint8_t tmp[4];
1457  uint32_t thresh_scaled;
1458 
1459  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1460  {
1461  return 2; /* return error */
1462  }
1463  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1464  {
1465  return 3; /* return error */
1466  }
1467  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1468  {
1469  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1470 
1471  return 4; /* return error */
1472  }
1473 
1474  thresh_scaled = MPU6500_DMP_GYRO_SF / 1000 * dps; /* convert to thresh scaled */
1475  tmp[0] = (uint8_t)(((uint32_t)thresh_scaled >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set the part 3 */
1476  tmp[1] = (uint8_t)(((uint32_t)thresh_scaled >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set the part 2 */
1477  tmp[2] = (uint8_t)(((uint32_t)thresh_scaled >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set the part 1 */
1478  tmp[3] = (uint8_t)((uint32_t)thresh_scaled & 0xFF); /* set the part 0 */
1479 
1480  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_92, tmp, 4); /* write data */
1481  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1482  {
1483  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1484 
1485  return 1; /* return error */
1486  }
1487 
1488  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1489 }
1490 
1503 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_shake_reject_thresh(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *dps)
1504 {
1505  uint8_t res;
1506  uint8_t tmp[4];
1507  uint32_t thresh_scaled;
1508 
1509  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1510  {
1511  return 2; /* return error */
1512  }
1513  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1514  {
1515  return 3; /* return error */
1516  }
1517  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1518  {
1519  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1520 
1521  return 4; /* return error */
1522  }
1523 
1524  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_92, tmp, 4); /* read data */
1525  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1526  {
1527  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
1528 
1529  return 1; /* return error */
1530  }
1531  thresh_scaled = (((uint32_t)tmp[0] << 24) | ((uint32_t)tmp[1] << 16) |
1532  ((uint32_t)tmp[2] << 8) | tmp[3]); /* get the thresh scaled */
1533  *dps = (uint16_t)((float)(thresh_scaled) /
1534  ((float)(MPU6500_DMP_GYRO_SF) / 1000.0f)); /* convert the thresh scaled */
1535 
1536  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1537 }
1538 
1551 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_tap_time_multi(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t ms)
1552 {
1553  uint8_t res;
1554  uint8_t tmp[2];
1555 
1556  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1557  {
1558  return 2; /* return error */
1559  }
1560  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1561  {
1562  return 3; /* return error */
1563  }
1564  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1565  {
1566  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1567 
1568  return 4; /* return error */
1569  }
1570 
1571  ms /= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
1572  tmp[0] = (ms >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set part 0 */
1573  tmp[1] = (ms >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set part 1 */
1574 
1575  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_218, tmp, 2); /* write data */
1576  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1577  {
1578  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1579 
1580  return 1; /* return error */
1581  }
1582 
1583  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1584 }
1585 
1598 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_tap_time_multi(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *ms)
1599 {
1600  uint8_t res;
1601  uint8_t tmp[2];
1602 
1603  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1604  {
1605  return 2; /* return error */
1606  }
1607  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1608  {
1609  return 3; /* return error */
1610  }
1611  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1612  {
1613  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1614 
1615  return 4; /* return error */
1616  }
1617 
1618  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_218, tmp, 2); /* read data */
1619  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1620  {
1621  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
1622 
1623  return 1; /* return error */
1624  }
1625  *ms = (uint16_t)((uint16_t)tmp[0] << 8) | tmp[1]; /* get the raw time */
1626  *ms *= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
1627 
1628  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1629 }
1630 
1643 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_tap_time(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t ms)
1644 {
1645  uint8_t res;
1646  uint8_t tmp[2];
1647 
1648  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1649  {
1650  return 2; /* return error */
1651  }
1652  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1653  {
1654  return 3; /* return error */
1655  }
1656  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1657  {
1658  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1659 
1660  return 4; /* return error */
1661  }
1662 
1663  ms /= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
1664  tmp[0] = (ms >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set part 0 */
1665  tmp[1] = (ms >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set part 1 */
1666 
1667  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAPW_MIN, tmp, 2); /* write data */
1668  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1669  {
1670  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1671 
1672  return 1; /* return error */
1673  }
1674 
1675  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1676 }

1690 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_tap_time(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *ms)
1691 {
1692  uint8_t res;
1693  uint8_t tmp[2];
1694 
1695  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1696  {
1697  return 2; /* return error */
1698  }
1699  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1700  {
1701  return 3; /* return error */
1702  }
1703  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1704  {
1705  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1706 
1707  return 4; /* return error */
1708  }
1709 
1710  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAPW_MIN, tmp, 2); /* read data */
1711  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1712  {
1713  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
1714 
1715  return 1; /* return error */
1716  }
1717  *ms = (uint16_t)((uint16_t)tmp[0] << 8) | tmp[1]; /* get the raw time */
1718  *ms *= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
1719 
1720  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1721 }
1722 
1736 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_min_tap_count(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t cnt)
1737 {
1738  uint8_t res;
1739  uint8_t tmp;
1740 
1741  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1742  {
1743  return 2; /* return error */
1744  }
1745  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1746  {
1747  return 3; /* return error */
1748  }
1749  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1750  {
1751  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1752 
1753  return 4; /* return error */
1754  }
1755  if ((cnt < 1) || (cnt > 4)) /* check cnt */
1756  {
1757  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: cnt must be between 1 and 4.\n"); /* cnt must be between 1 and 4 */
1758 
1759  return 5; /* return error */
1760  }
1761 
1762  tmp = cnt - 1; /* set the counter */
1763  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_79, &tmp, 1); /* write data */
1764  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1765  {
1766  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1767 
1768  return 1; /* return error */
1769  }
1770 
1771  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1772 }
1773 
1786 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_min_tap_count(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t *cnt)
1787 {
1788  uint8_t res;
1789  uint8_t tmp;
1790 
1791  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1792  {
1793  return 2; /* return error */
1794  }
1795  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1796  {
1797  return 3; /* return error */
1798  }
1799  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1800  {
1801  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1802 
1803  return 4; /* return error */
1804  }
1805 
1806  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_79, &tmp, 1); /* read data */
1807  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1808  {
1809  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
1810 
1811  return 1; /* return error */
1812  }
1813  *cnt = tmp + 1; /* set the counter */
1814 
1815  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1816 }
1817 
1830 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_gyro_calibrate(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
1831 {
1832  uint8_t res;
1833 
1834  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1835  {
1836  return 2; /* return error */
1837  }
1838  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1839  {
1840  return 3; /* return error */
1841  }
1842  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1843  {
1844  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1845 
1846  return 4; /* return error */
1847  }
1848 
1849  if (enable != 0) /* enable */
1850  {
1851  uint8_t regs[9] = {0xb8, 0xaa, 0xb3, 0x8d, 0xb4, 0x98, 0x0d, 0x35, 0x5d};
1852 
1853  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_MOTION_BIAS, regs, 9); /* write data */
1854  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1855  {
1856  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1857 
1858  return 1; /* return error */
1859  }
1860  handle->mask |= MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_GYRO_CAL; /* set the mask */
1861 
1862  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1863  }
1864  else /* disable */
1865  {
1866  uint8_t regs[9] = {0xb8, 0xaa, 0xaa, 0xaa, 0xb0, 0x88, 0xc3, 0xc5, 0xc7};
1867 
1868  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_MOTION_BIAS, regs, 9); /* write data */
1869  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1870  {
1871  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1872 
1873  return 1; /* return error */
1874  }
1875  handle->mask &= ~MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_GYRO_CAL; /* set the mask */
1876 
1877  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1878  }
1879 }
1880 
1893 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_3x_quaternion(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
1894 {
1895  uint8_t res;
1896 
1897  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1898  {
1899  return 2; /* return error */
1900  }
1901  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1902  {
1903  return 3; /* return error */
1904  }
1905  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1906  {
1907  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1908 
1909  return 4; /* return error */
1910  }
1911 
1912  if (enable != 0) /* enable */
1913  {
1914  uint8_t regs[4] = {0xC0, 0xC2, 0xC4, 0xC6};
1915 
1916  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_LP_QUAT, regs, 4); /* write data */
1917  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1918  {
1919  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1920 
1921  return 1; /* return error */
1922  }
1923  res = a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
1924  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1925  {
1926  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: reset fifo failed.\n"); /* reset fifo failed */
1927 
1928  return 1; /* return error */
1929  }
1930  handle->mask |= MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_3X_QUAT; /* set the mask */
1931 
1932  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1933  }
1934  else /* disable */
1935  {
1936  uint8_t regs[4] = {0x8B, 0x8B, 0x8B, 0x8B};
1937 
1938  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_LP_QUAT, regs, 4); /* write data */
1939  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1940  {
1941  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1942 
1943  return 1; /* return error */
1944  }
1945  res = a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
1946  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1947  {
1948  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: reset fifo failed.\n"); /* reset fifo failed */
1949 
1950  return 1; /* return error */
1951  }
1952  handle->mask &= ~MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_3X_QUAT; /* set the mask */
1953 
1954  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1955  }
1956 }
1957 
1970 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_6x_quaternion(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
1971 {
1972  uint8_t res;
1973 
1974  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1975  {
1976  return 2; /* return error */
1977  }
1978  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1979  {
1980  return 3; /* return error */
1981  }
1982  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
1983  {
1984  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
1985 
1986  return 4; /* return error */
1987  }
1988 
1989  if (enable != 0) /* enable */
1990  {
1991  uint8_t regs[4] = {0x20, 0x28, 0x30, 0x38};
1992 
1993  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_8, regs, 4); /* write data */
1994  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1995  {
1996  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
1997 
1998  return 1; /* return error */
1999  }
2000  res = a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
2001  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2002  {
2003  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: reset fifo failed.\n"); /* reset fifo failed */
2004 
2005  return 1; /* return error */
2006  }
2007  handle->mask |= MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_6X_QUAT; /* set the mask */
2008 
2009  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2010  }
2011  else /* disable */
2012  {
2013  uint8_t regs[4] = {0xA3, 0xA3, 0xA3, 0xA3};
2014 
2015  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_8, regs, 4); /* write data */
2016  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2017  {
2018  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2019 
2020  return 1; /* return error */
2021  }
2022  res = a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
2023  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2024  {
2025  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: reset fifo failed.\n"); /* reset fifo failed */
2026 
2027  return 1; /* return error */
2028  }
2029  handle->mask &= ~MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_6X_QUAT; /* set the mask */
2030 
2031  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2032  }
2033 }
2034 
2047 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_interrupt_mode(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_dmp_interrupt_mode_t mode)
2048 {
2049  uint8_t res;
2050 
2051  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2052  {
2053  return 2; /* return error */
2054  }
2055  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2056  {
2057  return 3; /* return error */
2058  }
2059  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
2060  {
2061  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
2062 
2063  return 4; /* return error */
2064  }
2065 
2066  if (mode == MPU6500_DMP_INTERRUPT_MODE_CONTINUOUS) /* continuous */
2067  {
2068  uint8_t regs_continuous[11] = {0xd8, 0xb1, 0xb9,
2069  0xf3, 0x8b, 0xa3,
2070  0x91, 0xb6, 0x09,
2071  0xb4, 0xd9};
2072 
2073  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_FIFO_ON_EVENT,
2074  (uint8_t *)regs_continuous, 11); /* write data */
2075  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2076  {
2077  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2078 
2079  return 1; /* return error */
2080  }
2081 
2082  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2083  }
2084  else /* disable */
2085  {
2086  uint8_t regs_gesture[11] = {0xda, 0xb1, 0xb9,
2087  0xf3, 0x8b, 0xa3,
2088  0x91, 0xb6, 0xda,
2089  0xb4, 0xda};
2090 
2091  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_FIFO_ON_EVENT,
2092  (uint8_t *)regs_gesture, 11); /* write data */
2093  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2094  {
2095  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2096 
2097  return 1; /* return error */
2098  }
2099 
2100  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2101  }
2102 }
2103 
2116 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_gyro_bias(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int32_t bias[3])
2117 {
2118  uint8_t res;
2119  uint8_t regs[4];
2120  int32_t gyro_bias_body[3];
2121 
2122  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2123  {
2124  return 2; /* return error */
2125  }
2126  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2127  {
2128  return 3; /* return error */
2129  }
2130  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
2131  {
2132  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
2133 
2134  return 4; /* return error */
2135  }
2136 
2137  gyro_bias_body[0] = bias[handle->orient & 3]; /* set the body 0 */
2138  if ((handle->orient & 4) != 0) /* check bit 3 */
2139  {
2140  gyro_bias_body[0] *= -1; /* *(-1) */
2141  }
2142  gyro_bias_body[1] = bias[(handle->orient >> 3) & 3]; /* set the body 1 */
2143  if ((handle->orient & 0x20) != 0) /* check bit 6 */
2144  {
2145  gyro_bias_body[1] *= -1; /* *(-1) */
2146  }
2147  gyro_bias_body[2] = bias[(handle->orient >> 6) & 3]; /* set the body 2 */
2148  if ((handle->orient & 0x100) != 0) /* check bit 9 */
2149  {
2150  gyro_bias_body[2] *= -1; /* *(-1) */
2151  }
2152 
2153  gyro_bias_body[0] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)gyro_bias_body[0] * MPU6500_DMP_GYRO_SF) >> 30); /* set body 0 */
2154  gyro_bias_body[1] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)gyro_bias_body[1] * MPU6500_DMP_GYRO_SF) >> 30); /* set body 1 */
2155  gyro_bias_body[2] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)gyro_bias_body[2] * MPU6500_DMP_GYRO_SF) >> 30); /* set body 2 */
2156 
2157  regs[0] = (uint8_t)((gyro_bias_body[0] >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set part 0 */
2158  regs[1] = (uint8_t)((gyro_bias_body[0] >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set part 1 */
2159  regs[2] = (uint8_t)((gyro_bias_body[0] >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set part 2 */
2160  regs[3] = (uint8_t)(gyro_bias_body[0] & 0xFF); /* set part 3 */
2161  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_EXT_GYRO_BIAS_X, (uint8_t *)regs, 4); /* write data */
2162  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2163  {
2164  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2165 
2166  return 1; /* return error */
2167  }
2168  regs[0] = (uint8_t)((gyro_bias_body[1] >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set part 0 */
2169  regs[1] = (uint8_t)((gyro_bias_body[1] >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set part 1 */
2170  regs[2] = (uint8_t)((gyro_bias_body[1] >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set part 2 */
2171  regs[3] = (uint8_t)(gyro_bias_body[1] & 0xFF); /* set part 3 */
2172  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_EXT_GYRO_BIAS_Y, (uint8_t *)regs, 4); /* write data */
2173  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2174  {
2175  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2176 
2177  return 1; /* return error */
2178  }
2179  regs[0] = (uint8_t)((gyro_bias_body[2] >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set part 0 */
2180  regs[1] = (uint8_t)((gyro_bias_body[2] >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set part 1 */
2181  regs[2] = (uint8_t)((gyro_bias_body[2] >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set part 2 */
2182  regs[3] = (uint8_t)(gyro_bias_body[2] & 0xFF); /* set part 3 */
2183  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_EXT_GYRO_BIAS_Z, (uint8_t *)regs, 4); /* write data */
2184  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2185  {
2186  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2187 
2188  return 1; /* return error */
2189  }
2190 
2191  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2192 }
2193 
2206 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_accel_bias(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int32_t bias[3])
2207 {
2208  uint8_t res;
2209  uint8_t prev;
2210  uint8_t range;
2211  int32_t accel_bias_body[3];
2212  uint8_t regs[12];
2213  int64_t accel_sf;
2214 
2215  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2216  {
2217  return 2; /* return error */
2218  }
2219  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2220  {
2221  return 3; /* return error */
2222  }
2223  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
2224  {
2225  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
2226 
2227  return 4; /* return error */
2228  }
2229 
2230  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_ACCEL_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read accelerometer config */
2231  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2232  {
2233  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read accelerometer config failed.\n"); /* read accelerometer config failed */
2234 
2235  return 1; /* return error */
2236  }
2237  range = ((prev >> 3) & 0x3); /* get the range */
2238  if (range == 0) /* if 2g */
2239  {
2240  accel_sf = (int64_t)16384 << 15; /* set the accel sf */
2241  }
2242  else if (range == 1) /* if 4g */
2243  {
2244  accel_sf = (int64_t)8192 << 15; /* set the accel sf */
2245  }
2246  else if (range == 2) /* if 8g */
2247  {
2248  accel_sf = (int64_t)4096 << 15; /* set the accel sf */
2249  }
2250  else /* if 16g */
2251  {
2252  accel_sf = (int64_t)2048 << 15; /* set the accel sf */
2253  }
2254 
2255  accel_bias_body[0] = bias[handle->orient & 3]; /* set the bias body 0 */
2256  if ((handle->orient & 4) != 0) /* check the orient */
2257  {
2258  accel_bias_body[0] *= -1; /* *(-1) */
2259  }
2260  accel_bias_body[1] = bias[(handle->orient >> 3) & 3]; /* set the bias body 1 */
2261  if ((handle->orient & 0x20) != 0) /* check the orient */
2262  {
2263  accel_bias_body[1] *= -1; /* *(-1) */
2264  }
2265  accel_bias_body[2] = bias[(handle->orient >> 6) & 3]; /* set the bias body 2 */
2266  if ((handle->orient & 0x100) != 0) /* check the orient */
2267  {
2268  accel_bias_body[2] *= -1; /* *(-1) */
2269  }
2270 
2271  accel_bias_body[0] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)accel_bias_body[0] * accel_sf) >> 30); /* set the bias body 0 */
2272  accel_bias_body[1] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)accel_bias_body[1] * accel_sf) >> 30); /* set the bias body 1 */
2273  accel_bias_body[2] = (int32_t)(((int64_t)accel_bias_body[2] * accel_sf) >> 30); /* set the bias body 2 */
2274  regs[0] = (uint8_t)((accel_bias_body[0] >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set reg 0 */
2275  regs[1] = (uint8_t)((accel_bias_body[0] >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set reg 1 */
2276  regs[2] = (uint8_t)((accel_bias_body[0] >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set reg 2 */
2277  regs[3] = (uint8_t)(accel_bias_body[0] & 0xFF); /* set reg 3 */
2278  regs[4] = (uint8_t)((accel_bias_body[1] >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set reg 4 */
2279  regs[5] = (uint8_t)((accel_bias_body[1] >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set reg 5 */
2280  regs[6] = (uint8_t)((accel_bias_body[1] >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set reg 6 */
2281  regs[7] = (uint8_t)(accel_bias_body[1] & 0xFF); /* set reg 7 */
2282  regs[8] = (uint8_t)((accel_bias_body[2] >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set reg 8 */
2283  regs[9] = (uint8_t)((accel_bias_body[2] >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set reg 9 */
2284  regs[10] = (uint8_t)((accel_bias_body[2] >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set reg 10 */
2285  regs[11] = (uint8_t)(accel_bias_body[2] & 0xFF); /* set reg 11 */
2286  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_ACCEL_BIAS, (uint8_t *)regs, 12); /* write data */
2287  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2288  {
2289  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2290 
2291  return 1; /* return error */
2292  }
2293 
2294  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2295 }
2296 
2309 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_orientation(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int8_t mat[9])
2310 {
2311  uint8_t gyro_axes[4] = {0x4C, 0xCD, 0x6C, 0x00};
2312  uint8_t accel_axes[4] = {0x0C, 0xC9, 0x2C, 0x00 };
2313  uint8_t gyro_sign[4] = {0x36, 0x56, 0x76, 0x00 };
2314  uint8_t accel_sign[4] = {0x26, 0x46, 0x66, 0x00 };
2315  uint8_t res;
2316  uint8_t gyro_regs[3];
2317  uint8_t accel_regs[3];
2318  uint16_t orient;
2319 
2320  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2321  {
2322  return 2; /* return error */
2323  }
2324  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2325  {
2326  return 3; /* return error */
2327  }
2328  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
2329  {
2330  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
2331 
2332  return 4; /* return error */
2333  }
2334 
2335  orient = a_mpu6500_inv_orientation_matrix_to_scalar(mat); /* inv orientation matrix to scalar */
2336  gyro_regs[0] = gyro_axes[orient & 3]; /* set the gyro regs 0 */
2337  gyro_regs[1] = gyro_axes[(orient >> 3) & 3]; /* set the gyro regs 1 */
2338  gyro_regs[2] = gyro_axes[(orient >> 6) & 3]; /* set the gyro regs 2 */
2339  accel_regs[0] = accel_axes[orient & 3]; /* set the accel regs 0 */
2340  accel_regs[1] = accel_axes[(orient >> 3) & 3]; /* set the accel regs 1 */
2341  accel_regs[2] = accel_axes[(orient >> 6) & 3]; /* set the accel regs 2 */
2342  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_FCFG_1,
2343  (uint8_t *)gyro_regs, 3); /* write data */
2344  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2345  {
2346  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2347 
2348  return 1; /* return error */
2349  }
2350  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_FCFG_2,
2351  (uint8_t *)accel_regs, 3); /* write data */
2352  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2353  {
2354  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2355 
2356  return 1; /* return error */
2357  }
2358 
2359  memcpy(gyro_regs, gyro_sign, 3); /* copy the gyro regs */
2360  memcpy(accel_regs, accel_sign, 3); /* copy the accel regs */
2361  if ((orient & 4) != 0) /* bit 3 */
2362  {
2363  gyro_regs[0] |= 1; /* set 1 */
2364  accel_regs[0] |= 1; /* set 1 */
2365  }
2366  if ((orient & 0x20) != 0) /* bit 6 */
2367  {
2368  gyro_regs[1] |= 1; /* set 1 */
2369  accel_regs[1] |= 1; /* set 1 */
2370  }
2371  if ((orient & 0x100) != 0) /* bit 9 */
2372  {
2373  gyro_regs[2] |= 1; /* set 1 */
2374  accel_regs[2] |= 1; /* set 1 */
2375  }
2376  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_FCFG_3,
2377  (uint8_t *)gyro_regs, 3); /* write data */
2378  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2379  {
2380  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2381 
2382  return 1; /* return error */
2383  }
2384  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_FCFG_7,
2385  (uint8_t *)accel_regs, 3); /* write data */
2386  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2387  {
2388  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2389 
2390  return 1; /* return error */
2391  }
2392  handle->orient = orient; /* set the orient */
2393 
2394  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2395 }
2396 
2413 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_feature(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t mask)
2414 {
2415  uint8_t res;
2416  uint8_t tmp[10];
2417 
2418  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2419  {
2420  return 2; /* return error */
2421  }
2422  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2423  {
2424  return 3; /* return error */
2425  }
2426  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
2427  {
2428  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
2429 
2430  return 4; /* return error */
2431  }
2432 
2433  tmp[0] = (uint8_t)((MPU6500_DMP_GYRO_SF >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set the param 0 */
2434  tmp[1] = (uint8_t)((MPU6500_DMP_GYRO_SF >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set the param 1 */
2435  tmp[2] = (uint8_t)((MPU6500_DMP_GYRO_SF >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set the param 2 */
2436  tmp[3] = (uint8_t)(MPU6500_DMP_GYRO_SF & 0xFF); /* set the param 3 */
2437  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_0_104, tmp, 4); /* write data */
2438  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2439  {
2440  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2441 
2442  return 1; /* return error */
2443  }
2444 
2445  tmp[0] = 0xA3;
2446  if ((mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_SEND_RAW_ACCEL) != 0) /* set the raw accel */
2447  {
2448  tmp[1] = 0xC0; /* set the param 1 */
2449  tmp[2] = 0xC8; /* set the param 2 */
2450  tmp[3] = 0xC2; /* set the param 3 */
2451  }
2452  else
2453  {
2454  tmp[1] = 0xA3; /* set the param 1 */
2455  tmp[2] = 0xA3; /* set the param 2 */
2456  tmp[3] = 0xA3; /* set the param 3 */
2457  }
2458  if ((mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_SEND_ANY_GYRO) != 0) /* set any gyro */
2459  {
2460  tmp[4] = 0xC4; /* set the param 4 */
2461  tmp[5] = 0xCC; /* set the param 5 */
2462  tmp[6] = 0xC6; /* set the param 6 */
2463  }
2464  else
2465  {
2466  tmp[4] = 0xA3; /* set the param 4 */
2467  tmp[5] = 0xA3; /* set the param 5 */
2468  tmp[6] = 0xA3; /* set the param 6 */
2469  }
2470  tmp[7] = 0xA3; /* set the param 7 */
2471  tmp[8] = 0xA3; /* set the param 8 */
2472  tmp[9] = 0xA3; /* set the param 9 */
2473  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_15, tmp, 10); /* write data */
2474  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2475  {
2476  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2477 
2478  return 1; /* return error */
2479  }
2480 
2481  if ((mask & (MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_TAP | MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_ORIENT)) != 0) /* set the cfg */
2482  {
2483  tmp[0] = 0x20; /* set the param */
2484  }
2485  else
2486  {
2487  tmp[0] = 0xD8; /* set the param */
2488  }
2489  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_27, tmp, 1); /* write data */
2490  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2491  {
2492  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2493 
2494  return 1; /* return error */
2495  }
2496 
2497  if ((mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_GYRO_CAL) != 0) /* if true */
2498  {
2499  uint8_t regs[9] = {0xb8, 0xaa, 0xb3, 0x8d, 0xb4, 0x98, 0x0d, 0x35, 0x5d};
2500 
2501  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_MOTION_BIAS, regs, 9); /* write data */
2502  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2503  {
2504  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2505 
2506  return 1; /* return error */
2507  }
2508  }
2509  else
2510  {
2511  uint8_t regs[9] = {0xb8, 0xaa, 0xaa, 0xaa, 0xb0, 0x88, 0xc3, 0xc5, 0xc7};
2512 
2513  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_MOTION_BIAS, regs, 9); /* write data */
2514  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2515  {
2516  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2517 
2518  return 1; /* return error */
2519  }
2520  }
2521 
2522  if ((mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_SEND_ANY_GYRO) != 0) /* check the gyro */
2523  {
2524  if ((mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_SEND_CAL_GYRO) != 0) /* set the cal gyro */
2525  {
2526  tmp[0] = 0xB2; /* set the param 0 */
2527  tmp[1] = 0x8B; /* set the param 1 */
2528  tmp[2] = 0xB6; /* set the param 2 */
2529  tmp[3] = 0x9B; /* set the param 3 */
2530  }
2531  else
2532  {
2533  tmp[0] = 0xC0; /* set the param 0 */
2534  tmp[1] = 0x80; /* set the param 1 */
2535  tmp[2] = 0xC2; /* set the param 2 */
2536  tmp[3] = 0x90; /* set the param 3 */
2537  }
2538  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_GYRO_RAW_DATA, tmp, 4); /* write data */
2539  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2540  {
2541  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2542 
2543  return 1; /* return error */
2544  }
2545  }
2546 
2547  if ((mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_TAP) != 0) /* check the tap */
2548  {
2549  uint8_t prev;
2550  uint16_t ms;
2551  uint16_t dps;
2552  uint32_t thresh_scaled;
2553  uint8_t range;
2554  uint16_t dmp_thresh;
2555  uint16_t dmp_thresh_2;
2556  float scaled_thresh;
2557 
2558  tmp[0] = 0xF8; /* set the param */
2559  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_20, tmp, 1); /* write data */
2560  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2561  {
2562  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2563 
2564  return 1; /* return error */
2565  }
2566 
2567  scaled_thresh = (float)MPU6500_DMP_TAP_THRESH / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE; /* get the scaled thresh */
2568  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_ACCEL_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read accelerometer config */
2569  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2570  {
2571  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read accelerometer config failed.\n"); /* read accelerometer config failed */
2572 
2573  return 1; /* return error */
2574  }
2575  range = ((prev >> 3) & 0x3); /* get the range */
2576  if (range == 0) /* if 2g */
2577  {
2578  dmp_thresh = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 16384); /* set dmp thresh */
2579  dmp_thresh_2 = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 12288); /* set dmp thresh2 */
2580  }
2581  else if (range == 1) /* if 4g */
2582  {
2583  dmp_thresh = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 8192); /* set dmp thresh */
2584  dmp_thresh_2 = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 6144); /* set dmp thresh2 */
2585  }
2586  else if (range == 2) /* if 8g */
2587  {
2588  dmp_thresh = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 4096); /* set dmp thresh */
2589  dmp_thresh_2 = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 3072); /* set dmp thresh2 */
2590  }
2591  else /* if 16g */
2592  {
2593  dmp_thresh = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 2048); /* set dmp thresh */
2594  dmp_thresh_2 = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 1536); /* set dmp thresh2 */
2595  }
2596  tmp[0] = (uint8_t)(dmp_thresh >> 8); /* set part 0 */
2597  tmp[1] = (uint8_t)(dmp_thresh & 0xFF); /* set part 1 */
2598  tmp[2] = (uint8_t)(dmp_thresh_2 >> 8); /* set part 2 */
2599  tmp[3] = (uint8_t)(dmp_thresh_2 & 0xFF); /* set part 3 */
2600 
2601  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAP_THX, tmp, 2); /* write tap threshold x */
2602  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2603  {
2604  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2605 
2606  return 1; /* return error */
2607  }
2608  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_36, tmp + 2, 2); /* write register 36 */
2609  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2610  {
2611  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2612 
2613  return 1; /* return error */
2614  }
2615 
2616  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAP_THY, tmp, 2); /* write tap threshold y */
2617  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2618  {
2619  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2620 
2621  return 1; /* return error */
2622  }
2623  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_40, tmp + 2, 2); /* write register 40 */
2624  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2625  {
2626  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2627 
2628  return 1; /* return error */
2629  }
2630 
2631  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAP_THZ, tmp, 2); /* write tap threshold z */
2632  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2633  {
2634  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2635 
2636  return 1; /* return error */
2637  }
2638  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_44, tmp + 2, 2); /* write register 44 */
2639  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2640  {
2641  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2642 
2643  return 1; /* return error */
2644  }
2645 
2646  tmp[0] = 0x3F; /* enable all tap axis */
2647  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_72, tmp, 1); /* write data */
2648  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2649  {
2650  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2651 
2652  return 1; /* return error */
2653  }
2654 
2655  tmp[0] = MPU6500_DMP_TAP_MIN_TAP_COUNT - 1; /* set the counter */
2656  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_79, tmp, 1); /* write data */
2657  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2658  {
2659  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2660 
2661  return 1; /* return error */
2662  }
2663 
2664  ms = MPU6500_DMP_TAP_TIME; /* set tap time */
2665  ms /= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
2666  tmp[0] = (ms >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set part 0 */
2667  tmp[1] = (ms >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set part 1 */
2668 
2669  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAPW_MIN, tmp, 2); /* write data */
2670  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2671  {
2672  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2673 
2674  return 1; /* return error */
2675  }
2676 
2677  ms = MPU6500_DMP_TAP_TIME_MULTI; /* set tap time multi */
2678  ms /= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
2679  tmp[0] = (ms >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set part 0 */
2680  tmp[1] = (ms >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set part 1 */
2681 
2682  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_218, tmp, 2); /* write data */
2683  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2684  {
2685  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2686 
2687  return 1; /* return error */
2688  }
2689 
2690  dps = MPU6500_DMP_SHAKE_REJECT_THRESH; /* set the shake reject thresh */
2691  thresh_scaled = MPU6500_DMP_GYRO_SF / 1000 * dps; /* convert to thresh scaled */
2692  tmp[0] = (uint8_t)(((uint32_t)thresh_scaled >> 24) & 0xFF); /* set the part 3 */
2693  tmp[1] = (uint8_t)(((uint32_t)thresh_scaled >> 16) & 0xFF); /* set the part 2 */
2694  tmp[2] = (uint8_t)(((uint32_t)thresh_scaled >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set the part 1 */
2695  tmp[3] = (uint8_t)((uint32_t)thresh_scaled & 0xFF); /* set the part 0 */
2696 
2697  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_92, tmp, 4); /* write data */
2698  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2699  {
2700  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2701 
2702  return 1; /* return error */
2703  }
2704 
2705  ms = MPU6500_DMP_SHAKE_REJECT_TIME; /* set the reject time */
2706  ms /= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
2707  tmp[0] = (ms >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set part 0 */
2708  tmp[1] = (ms >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set part 1 */
2709 
2710  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_90, tmp, 2); /* write data */
2711  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2712  {
2713  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2714 
2715  return 1; /* return error */
2716  }
2717 
2718  ms = MPU6500_DMP_SHAKE_REJECT_TIMEOUT; /* set the reject timeout */
2719  ms /= (1000 / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* convert time */
2720  tmp[0] = (ms >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set part 0 */
2721  tmp[1] = (ms >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set part 1 */
2722 
2723  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_88, tmp, 2); /* write data */
2724  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2725  {
2726  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2727 
2728  return 1; /* return error */
2729  }
2730  }
2731  else
2732  {
2733  tmp[0] = 0xD8; /* set the param */
2734  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_20, tmp, 1); /* write data */
2735  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2736  {
2737  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2738 
2739  return 1; /* return error */
2740  }
2741  }
2742 
2743  if ((mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_ORIENT) != 0) /* set the orient */
2744  {
2745  tmp[0] = 0xD9; /* set the param */
2746  }
2747  else
2748  {
2749  tmp[0] = 0xD8; /* set the param */
2750  }
2751  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_ORIENT_INT, tmp, 1); /* write data */
2752  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2753  {
2754  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2755 
2756  return 1; /* return error */
2757  }
2758 
2759  if ((mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_3X_QUAT) != 0) /* true */
2760  {
2761  uint8_t regs[4] = {0xC0, 0xC2, 0xC4, 0xC6};
2762 
2763  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_LP_QUAT, regs, 4); /* write data */
2764  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2765  {
2766  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2767 
2768  return 1; /* return error */
2769  }
2770  res = a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
2771  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2772  {
2773  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: reset fifo failed.\n"); /* reset fifo failed */
2774 
2775  return 1; /* return error */
2776  }
2777  }
2778  else
2779  {
2780  uint8_t regs[4] = {0x8B, 0x8B, 0x8B, 0x8B};
2781 
2782  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_LP_QUAT, regs, 4); /* write data */
2783  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2784  {
2785  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2786 
2787  return 1; /* return error */
2788  }
2789  res = a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
2790  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2791  {
2792  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: reset fifo failed.\n"); /* reset fifo failed */
2793 
2794  return 1; /* return error */
2795  }
2796  }
2797 
2798  if ((mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_6X_QUAT) != 0) /* enable */
2799  {
2800  uint8_t regs[4] = {0x20, 0x28, 0x30, 0x38};
2801 
2802  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_8, regs, 4); /* write data */
2803  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2804  {
2805  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2806 
2807  return 1; /* return error */
2808  }
2809  res = a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
2810  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2811  {
2812  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: reset fifo failed.\n"); /* reset fifo failed */
2813 
2814  return 1; /* return error */
2815  }
2816  }
2817  else
2818  {
2819  uint8_t regs[4] = {0xA3, 0xA3, 0xA3, 0xA3};
2820 
2821  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_8, regs, 4); /* write data */
2822  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2823  {
2824  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2825 
2826  return 1; /* return error */
2827  }
2828  res = a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
2829  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2830  {
2831  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: reset fifo failed.\n"); /* reset fifo failed */
2832 
2833  return 1; /* return error */
2834  }
2835  }
2836 
2837  handle->mask = mask | MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_PEDOMETER; /* set the mask */
2838 
2839  return a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
2840 }
2841 
2855 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_fifo_rate(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t rate)
2856 {
2857  uint8_t regs_end[12] = {0xFE, 0xF2, 0xAB,
2858  0xC4, 0xAA, 0xF1,
2859  0xDF, 0xDF, 0xBB,
2860  0xAF, 0xDF, 0xDF};
2861  uint8_t res;
2862  uint16_t d;
2863  uint8_t tmp[2];
2864 
2865  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2866  {
2867  return 2; /* return error */
2868  }
2869  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2870  {
2871  return 3; /* return error */
2872  }
2873  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
2874  {
2875  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
2876 
2877  return 4; /* return error */
2878  }
2879  if (rate > MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE) /* check rate */
2880  {
2881  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: rate > 200.\n"); /* rate > 200 */
2882 
2883  return 5; /* return error */
2884  }
2885 
2886  d = MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE / rate - 1; /* set div */
2887  tmp[0] = (uint8_t)((d >> 8) & 0xFF); /* set tmp part0 */
2888  tmp[1] = (uint8_t)(d & 0xFF); /* set tmp part1 */
2889 
2890  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_0_22, tmp, 2); /* write data */
2891  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2892  {
2893  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2894 
2895  return 1; /* return error */
2896  }
2897  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_CFG_6,
2898  (uint8_t *)regs_end, 12); /* write data */
2899  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2900  {
2901  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
2902 
2903  return 1; /* return error */
2904  }
2905 
2906  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2907 }
2908 
2921 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_fifo_rate(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *rate)
2922 {
2923  uint8_t res;
2924  uint16_t d;
2925  uint8_t tmp[2];
2926 
2927  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2928  {
2929  return 2; /* return error */
2930  }
2931  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2932  {
2933  return 3; /* return error */
2934  }
2935  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
2936  {
2937  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
2938 
2939  return 4; /* return error */
2940  }
2941 
2942  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_0_22, tmp, 2); /* read data */
2943  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2944  {
2945  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
2946 
2947  return 1; /* return error */
2948  }
2949  d = (uint16_t)tmp[0] << 8 | tmp[1]; /* get the div */
2950  *rate = MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE / (d + 1); /* set the rate */
2951 
2952  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2953 }
2954 
2968 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_tap_axes(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_axis_t axis, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
2969 {
2970  uint8_t res;
2971  uint8_t tmp;
2972  uint8_t pos;
2973 
2974  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2975  {
2976  return 2; /* return error */
2977  }
2978  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2979  {
2980  return 3; /* return error */
2981  }
2982  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
2983  {
2984  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
2985 
2986  return 4; /* return error */
2987  }
2988 
2989  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_72, &tmp, 1); /* read data */
2990  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2991  {
2992  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
2993 
2994  return 1; /* return error */
2995  }
2996  pos = (uint8_t)((axis - 5) * 2); /* get the pos */
2997  if (enable == MPU6500_BOOL_TRUE) /* if enable */
2998  {
2999  tmp |= (3 << pos); /* enable */
3000  }
3001  else
3002  {
3003  tmp &= ~(3 << pos); /* disable */
3004  }
3005  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_72, &tmp, 1); /* write data */
3006  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3007  {
3008  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
3009 
3010  return 1; /* return error */
3011  }
3012 
3013  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3014 }
3015 
3029 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_tap_axes(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_axis_t axis, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
3030 {
3031  uint8_t res;
3032  uint8_t tmp;
3033  uint8_t pos;
3034 
3035  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3036  {
3037  return 2; /* return error */
3038  }
3039  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3040  {
3041  return 3; /* return error */
3042  }
3043  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
3044  {
3045  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
3046 
3047  return 4; /* return error */
3048  }
3049 
3050  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_72, &tmp, 1); /* read data */
3051  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3052  {
3053  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
3054 
3055  return 1; /* return error */
3056  }
3057  pos = (uint8_t)((axis - 5) * 2); /* get the pos */
3058  if (((tmp >> pos) & 0x3) == 0x3) /* if enable */
3059  {
3060  *enable = MPU6500_BOOL_TRUE; /* set enable */
3061  }
3062  else
3063  {
3064  *enable = MPU6500_BOOL_FALSE; /* set disable */
3065  }
3066 
3067  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3068 }
3069 
3085 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_tap_thresh(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_axis_t axis, uint16_t mg_ms)
3086 {
3087  uint8_t res;
3088  uint8_t prev;
3089  uint8_t range;
3090  uint8_t tmp[4];
3091  uint16_t dmp_thresh;
3092  uint16_t dmp_thresh_2;
3093  float scaled_thresh;
3094 
3095  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3096  {
3097  return 2; /* return error */
3098  }
3099  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3100  {
3101  return 3; /* return error */
3102  }
3103  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
3104  {
3105  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
3106 
3107  return 4; /* return error */
3108  }
3109  if (mg_ms > 1600) /* check the mg/ms */
3110  {
3111  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: mg/ms > 1600.\n"); /* mg/ms > 1600 */
3112 
3113  return 5; /* return error */
3114  }
3115 
3116  scaled_thresh = (float)mg_ms / MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE; /* get the scaled thresh */
3117  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_ACCEL_CONFIG,
3118  (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read accelerometer config */
3119  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3120  {
3121  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read accelerometer config failed.\n"); /* read accelerometer config failed */
3122 
3123  return 1; /* return error */
3124  }
3125  range = ((prev >> 3) & 0x3); /* get the range */
3126  if (range == 0) /* if 2g */
3127  {
3128  dmp_thresh = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 16384); /* set dmp thresh */
3129  dmp_thresh_2 = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 12288); /* set dmp thresh2 */
3130  }
3131  else if (range == 1) /* if 4g */
3132  {
3133  dmp_thresh = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 8192); /* set dmp thresh */
3134  dmp_thresh_2 = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 6144); /* set dmp thresh2 */
3135  }
3136  else if (range == 2) /* if 8g */
3137  {
3138  dmp_thresh = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 4096); /* set dmp thresh */
