3139  dmp_thresh_2 = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 3072); /* set dmp thresh2 */
3140  }
3141  else /* if 16g */
3142  {
3143  dmp_thresh = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 2048); /* set dmp thresh */
3144  dmp_thresh_2 = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * 1536); /* set dmp thresh2 */
3145  }
3146  tmp[0] = (uint8_t)(dmp_thresh >> 8); /* set part 0 */
3147  tmp[1] = (uint8_t)(dmp_thresh & 0xFF); /* set part 1 */
3148  tmp[2] = (uint8_t)(dmp_thresh_2 >> 8); /* set part 2 */
3149  tmp[3] = (uint8_t)(dmp_thresh_2 & 0xFF); /* set part 3 */
3150 
3151  if (axis == MPU6500_AXIS_X) /* if axis x */
3152  {
3153  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAP_THX, tmp, 2); /* write tap threshold x */
3154  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3155  {
3156  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
3157 
3158  return 1; /* return error */
3159  }
3160  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_36, tmp + 2, 2); /* write register 36 */
3161  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3162  {
3163  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
3164 
3165  return 1; /* return error */
3166  }
3167 
3168  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3169  }
3170  else if (axis == MPU6500_AXIS_Y) /* if axis y */
3171  {
3172  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAP_THY, tmp, 2); /* write tap threshold y */
3173  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3174  {
3175  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
3176 
3177  return 1; /* return error */
3178  }
3179  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_40, tmp + 2, 2); /* write register 40 */
3180  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3181  {
3182  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
3183 
3184  return 1; /* return error */
3185  }
3186 
3187  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3188  }
3189  else if (axis == MPU6500_AXIS_Z) /* if axis z */
3190  {
3191  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAP_THZ, tmp, 2); /* write tap threshold z */
3192  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3193  {
3194  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
3195 
3196  return 1; /* return error */
3197  }
3198  res = a_mpu6500_write_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_D_1_44, tmp + 2, 2); /* write register 44 */
3199  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3200  {
3201  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write mem failed.\n"); /* write mem failed */
3202 
3203  return 1; /* return error */
3204  }
3205 
3206  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3207  }
3208  else
3209  {
3210  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid axis.\n"); /* invalid axis */
3211 
3212  return 6; /* return error */
3213  }
3214 }
3215 
3230 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_get_tap_thresh(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_axis_t axis, uint16_t *mg_ms)
3231 {
3232  uint8_t res;
3233  uint8_t prev;
3234  uint8_t range;
3235  uint8_t tmp[2];
3236  uint16_t dmp_thresh;
3237  float scaled_thresh;
3238 
3239  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3240  {
3241  return 2; /* return error */
3242  }
3243  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3244  {
3245  return 3; /* return error */
3246  }
3247  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
3248  {
3249  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
3250 
3251  return 4; /* return error */
3252  }
3253 
3254  if (axis == MPU6500_AXIS_X) /* if axis x */
3255  {
3256  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAP_THX, tmp, 2); /* read tap threshold x */
3257  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3258  {
3259  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
3260 
3261  return 1; /* return error */
3262  }
3263  }
3264  else if (axis == MPU6500_AXIS_Y) /* if axis y */
3265  {
3266  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAP_THY, tmp, 2); /* read tap threshold y */
3267  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3268  {
3269  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
3270 
3271  return 1; /* return error */
3272  }
3273  }
3274  else if (axis == MPU6500_AXIS_Z) /* if axis z */
3275  {
3276  res = a_mpu6500_read_mem(handle, MPU6500_DMP_TAP_THZ, tmp, 2); /* read tap threshold z */
3277  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3278  {
3279  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read mem failed.\n"); /* read mem failed */
3280 
3281  return 1; /* return error */
3282  }
3283  }
3284  else
3285  {
3286  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid axis.\n"); /* invalid axis */
3287 
3288  return 5; /* return error */
3289  }
3290  dmp_thresh = (uint16_t)tmp[0] << 8 | tmp[1]; /* set the dmp thresh */
3291 
3292  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_ACCEL_CONFIG,
3293  (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read accelerometer config */
3294  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3295  {
3296  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read accelerometer config failed.\n"); /* read accelerometer config failed */
3297 
3298  return 1; /* return error */
3299  }
3300  range = ((prev >> 3) & 0x3); /* get the range */
3301  if (range == 0) /* if 2g */
3302  {
3303  scaled_thresh = dmp_thresh / 16384.0f; /* set dmp thresh */
3304  }
3305  else if (range == 1) /* if 4g */
3306  {
3307  scaled_thresh = dmp_thresh / 8192.0f; /* set dmp thresh */
3308  }
3309  else if (range == 2) /* if 8g */
3310  {
3311  scaled_thresh = dmp_thresh / 4096.0f; /* set dmp thresh */
3312  }
3313  else /* if 16g */
3314  {
3315  scaled_thresh = dmp_thresh / 2048.0f; /* set dmp thresh */
3316  }
3317  *mg_ms = (uint16_t)(scaled_thresh * MPU6500_DMP_SAMPLE_RATE); /* set the mg/ms */
3318 
3319  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3320 }
3321 
3346 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_read(mpu6500_handle_t *handle,
3347  int16_t (*accel_raw)[3], float (*accel_g)[3],
3348  int16_t (*gyro_raw)[3], float (*gyro_dps)[3],
3349  int32_t (*quat)[4],
3350  float *pitch, float *roll, float *yaw,
3351  uint16_t *l
3352  )
3353 {
3354  uint8_t res;
3355  uint8_t i = 0;
3356  uint16_t len;
3357  uint8_t buf[2];
3358  uint8_t prev;
3359  uint16_t count;
3360  uint16_t j;
3361 
3362  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3363  {
3364  return 2; /* return error */
3365  }
3366  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3367  {
3368  return 3; /* return error */
3369  }
3370  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
3371  {
3372  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
3373 
3374  return 4; /* return error */
3375  }
3376 
3377  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_STATUS, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
3378  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3379  {
3380  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read int status failed.\n"); /* read int status failed */
3381 
3382  return 1; /* return error */
3383  }
3384  if ((prev & (1 << MPU6500_INTERRUPT_FIFO_OVERFLOW)) != 0) /* if fifo overflow */
3385  {
3386  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: fifo overflow.\n"); /* fifo overflow */
3387  (void)a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
3388 
3389  return 6; /* return error */
3390  }
3391 
3392  len = 0; /* set len 0 */
3393  if ((handle->mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_SEND_RAW_ACCEL) != 0) /* check the accel */
3394  {
3395  len += 6; /* size += 6 */
3396  }
3397  if ((handle->mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_SEND_ANY_GYRO) != 0) /* check the gyro */
3398  {
3399  len += 6; /* size += 6 */
3400  }
3401  if ((handle->mask & (MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_3X_QUAT | MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_6X_QUAT)) != 0) /* check the quat */
3402  {
3403  len += 16; /* size += 16 */
3404  }
3405  if ((handle->mask & (MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_TAP | MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_ORIENT)) != 0) /* check the tap and orient */
3406  {
3407  len += 4; /* size += 4 */
3408  }
3409  if (len == 0) /* check the len */
3410  {
3411  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: no data.\n"); /* no data */
3412 
3413  return 8; /* return error */
3414  }
3415 
3416  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_COUNTH, (uint8_t *)buf, 2); /* read fifo count */
3417  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3418  {
3419  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read fifo count failed.\n"); /* read fifo count failed */
3420 
3421  return 1; /* return error */
3422  }
3423  count = (uint16_t)(((uint16_t)buf[0] << 8) | buf[1]); /* set count */
3424  count = (count < 1024) ? count : 1024; /* just the counter */
3425  count = (count < (*l) * len) ? count : ((*l) *len); /* just outer buffer size */
3426  count = (count / len) * len; /* len times */
3427  *l = count / len; /* set the output length */
3428  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_R_W, handle->buf, count); /* read data */
3429  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3430  {
3431  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read failed.\n"); /* read failed */
3432 
3433  return 1; /* return error */
3434  }
3435  if (count < len) /* check the count */
3436  {
3437  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: fifo data is too little.\n"); /* fifo data is too little */
3438 
3439  return 7; /* return error */
3440  }
3441 
3442  for (j = 0; j < (*l); j++) /* (*l) times */
3443  {
3444  if ((handle->mask & (MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_3X_QUAT | MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_6X_QUAT)) != 0) /* check the quat */
3445  {
3446  int32_t quat_q14[4];
3447  int32_t quat_mag_sq;
3448  float q0 = 1.0f, q1 = 0.0f, q2 = 0.0f, q3 = 0.0f;
3449 
3450  i = 0; /* set 0 */
3451  quat[j][0] = ((int32_t)handle->buf[0 + len * j] << 24) | ((int32_t)handle->buf[1 + len * j] << 16) |
3452  ((int32_t)handle->buf[2 + len * j] << 8) | handle->buf[3 + len * j]; /* set the quat 0 */
3453  quat[j][1] = ((int32_t)handle->buf[4 + len * j] << 24) | ((int32_t)handle->buf[5 + len * j] << 16) |
3454  ((int32_t)handle->buf[6 + len * j] << 8) | handle->buf[7 + len * j]; /* set the quat 1 */
3455  quat[j][2] = ((int32_t)handle->buf[8 + len * j] << 24) | ((int32_t)handle->buf[9 + len * j] << 16) |
3456  ((int32_t)handle->buf[10 + len * j] << 8) | handle->buf[11 + len * j]; /* set the quat 2 */
3457  quat[j][3] = ((int32_t)handle->buf[12 + len * j] << 24) | ((int32_t)handle->buf[13 + len * j] << 16) |
3458  ((int32_t)handle->buf[14 + len * j] << 8) | handle->buf[15 + len * j]; /* set the quat 3 */
3459  i += 16; /* size += 16 */
3460 
3461  quat_q14[0] = quat[j][0] >> 16; /* set the quat q14[0] */
3462  quat_q14[1] = quat[j][1] >> 16; /* set the quat q14[1] */
3463  quat_q14[2] = quat[j][2] >> 16; /* set the quat q14[2] */
3464  quat_q14[3] = quat[j][3] >> 16; /* set the quat q14[3] */
3465  quat_mag_sq = quat_q14[0] * quat_q14[0] + quat_q14[1] * quat_q14[1] +
3466  quat_q14[2] * quat_q14[2] + quat_q14[3] * quat_q14[3]; /* get the quat mag sq */
3467  if ((quat_mag_sq < MPU6500_DMP_QUAT_MAG_SQ_MIN) ||
3468  (quat_mag_sq > MPU6500_DMP_QUAT_MAG_SQ_MAX)) /* check the size */
3469  {
3470  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: quat check error.\n"); /* quat check error */
3471  (void)a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
3472 
3473  return 5; /* return error */
3474  }
3475  q0 = quat[j][0] / 1073741824.0f; /* set q0 */
3476  q1 = quat[j][1] / 1073741824.0f; /* set q1 */
3477  q2 = quat[j][2] / 1073741824.0f; /* set q2 */
3478  q3 = quat[j][3] / 1073741824.0f; /* set q3 */
3479  pitch[j] = asinf(-2 * q1 * q3 + 2 * q0* q2)* 57.3f; /* set pitch */
3480  roll[j] = atan2f(2 * q2 * q3 + 2 * q0 * q1, -2 * q1 * q1 - 2 * q2 * q2 + 1)* 57.3f; /* set roll */
3481  yaw[j] = atan2f(2 * (q1 * q2 + q0 * q3), q0 * q0 + q1 * q1 - q2 * q2 - q3 * q3) * 57.3f; /* set yaw */
3482  }
3483  else
3484  {
3485  quat[j][0] = 0; /* set 0 */
3486  quat[j][1] = 0; /* set 0 */
3487  quat[j][2] = 0; /* set 0 */
3488  quat[j][3] = 0; /* set 0 */
3489  pitch[j] = 0.0f; /* set 0.0f */
3490  roll[j] = 0.0f; /* set 0.0f */
3491  yaw[j] = 0.0f; /* set 0.0f */
3492  }
3493  if ((handle->mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_SEND_RAW_ACCEL) != 0) /* check the accel */
3494  {
3495  uint8_t accel_conf;
3496 
3497  accel_raw[j][0] = ((int16_t)handle->buf[i + 0 + len * j] << 8) | handle->buf[i + 1 + len * j]; /* set the accel x raw data */
3498  accel_raw[j][1] = ((int16_t)handle->buf[i + 2 + len * j] << 8) | handle->buf[i + 3 + len * j]; /* set the accel y raw data */
3499  accel_raw[j][2] = ((int16_t)handle->buf[i + 4 + len * j] << 8) | handle->buf[i + 5 + len * j]; /* set the accel z raw data */
3500  i += 6; /* size += 6 */
3501 
3502  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_ACCEL_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&accel_conf, 1); /* read accel config */
3503  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3504  {
3505  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read accel config failed.\n"); /* read accel config failed */
3506 
3507  return 1; /* return error */
3508  }
3509  accel_conf = (accel_conf >> 3) & 0x3; /* get the accel conf */
3510  if (accel_conf == 0) /* 2g */
3511  {
3512  accel_g[j][0] = (float)(accel_raw[j][0]) / 16384.0f; /* set accel x */
3513  accel_g[j][1] = (float)(accel_raw[j][1]) / 16384.0f; /* set accel y */
3514  accel_g[j][2] = (float)(accel_raw[j][2]) / 16384.0f; /* set accel z */
3515  }
3516  else if (accel_conf == 1) /* 4g */
3517  {
3518  accel_g[j][0] = (float)(accel_raw[j][0]) / 8192.0f; /* set accel x */
3519  accel_g[j][1] = (float)(accel_raw[j][1]) / 8192.0f; /* set accel y */
3520  accel_g[j][2] = (float)(accel_raw[j][2]) / 8192.0f; /* set accel z */
3521  }
3522  else if (accel_conf == 2) /* 8g */
3523  {
3524  accel_g[j][0] = (float)(accel_raw[j][0]) / 4096.0f; /* set accel x */
3525  accel_g[j][1] = (float)(accel_raw[j][1]) / 4096.0f; /* set accel y */
3526  accel_g[j][2] = (float)(accel_raw[j][2]) / 4096.0f; /* set accel z */
3527  }
3528  else /* 16g */
3529  {
3530  accel_g[j][0] = (float)(accel_raw[j][0]) / 2048.0f; /* set accel x */
3531  accel_g[j][1] = (float)(accel_raw[j][1]) / 2048.0f; /* set accel y */
3532  accel_g[j][2] = (float)(accel_raw[j][2]) / 2048.0f; /* set accel z */
3533  }
3534  }
3535  else
3536  {
3537  accel_raw[j][0] = 0; /* set 0 */
3538  accel_raw[j][1] = 0; /* set 0 */
3539  accel_raw[j][2] = 0; /* set 0 */
3540  accel_g[j][0] = 0.0f; /* set 0.0f */
3541  accel_g[j][1] = 0.0f; /* set 0.0f */
3542  accel_g[j][2] = 0.0f; /* set 0.0f */
3543  }
3544  if ((handle->mask & MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_SEND_ANY_GYRO) != 0) /* check the gyro */
3545  {
3546  uint8_t gyro_conf;
3547 
3548  gyro_raw[j][0] = ((int16_t)handle->buf[i + 0 + len * j] << 8) | handle->buf[i + 1 + len * j]; /* set the gyro x raw data */
3549  gyro_raw[j][1] = ((int16_t)handle->buf[i + 2 + len * j] << 8) | handle->buf[i + 3 + len * j]; /* set the gyro y raw data */
3550  gyro_raw[j][2] = ((int16_t)handle->buf[i + 4 + len * j] << 8) | handle->buf[i + 5 + len * j]; /* set the gyro z raw data */
3551  i += 6; /* size += 6 */
3552 
3553  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_GYRO_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&gyro_conf, 1); /* read gyro config */
3554  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3555  {
3556  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read gyro config failed.\n"); /* read gyro config failed */
3557 
3558  return 1; /* return error */
3559  }
3560  gyro_conf = (gyro_conf >> 3) & 0x3; /* get the gyro conf */
3561  if (gyro_conf == 0) /* 250dps */
3562  {
3563  gyro_dps[j][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][0]) / 131.0f; /* set gyro x */
3564  gyro_dps[j][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][1]) / 131.0f; /* set gyro y */
3565  gyro_dps[j][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][2]) / 131.0f; /* set gyro z */
3566  }
3567  else if (gyro_conf == 1) /* 500dps */
3568  {
3569  gyro_dps[j][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][0]) / 65.5f; /* set gyro x */
3570  gyro_dps[j][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][1]) / 65.5f; /* set gyro y */
3571  gyro_dps[j][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][2]) / 65.5f; /* set gyro z */
3572  }
3573  else if (gyro_conf == 2) /* 1000dps */
3574  {
3575  gyro_dps[j][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][0]) / 32.8f; /* set gyro x */
3576  gyro_dps[j][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][1]) / 32.8f; /* set gyro y */
3577  gyro_dps[j][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][2]) / 32.8f; /* set gyro z */
3578  }
3579  else /* 2000dps */
3580  {
3581  gyro_dps[j][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][0]) / 16.4f; /* set gyro x */
3582  gyro_dps[j][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][1]) / 16.4f; /* set gyro y */
3583  gyro_dps[j][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[j][2]) / 16.4f; /* set gyro z */
3584  }
3585  }
3586  else
3587  {
3588  gyro_raw[j][0] = 0; /* set 0 */
3589  gyro_raw[j][1] = 0; /* set 0 */
3590  gyro_raw[j][2] = 0; /* set 0 */
3591  gyro_dps[j][0] = 0.0f; /* set 0.0f */
3592  gyro_dps[j][1] = 0.0f; /* set 0.0f */
3593  gyro_dps[j][2] = 0.0f; /* set 0.0f */
3594  }
3595  if ((handle->mask & (MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_TAP | MPU6500_DMP_FEATURE_ORIENT)) != 0) /* check the tap and orient */
3596  {
3597  a_mpu6500_dmp_decode_gesture(handle, handle->buf + i + len * j); /* run the decode gesture */
3598  }
3599  }
3600 
3601  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3602 }
3603 
3616 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_tap_callback(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, void (*callback)(uint8_t count, uint8_t direction))
3617 {
3618  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3619  {
3620  return 2; /* return error */
3621  }
3622  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3623  {
3624  return 3; /* return error */
3625  }
3626  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
3627  {
3628  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
3629 
3630  return 4; /* return error */
3631  }
3632 
3633  handle->dmp_tap_callback = callback; /* set the callback */
3634 
3635  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3636 }
3637 
3650 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_orient_callback(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, void (*callback)(uint8_t orientation))
3651 {
3652  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3653  {
3654  return 2; /* return error */
3655  }
3656  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3657  {
3658  return 3; /* return error */
3659  }
3660  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
3661  {
3662  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
3663 
3664  return 4; /* return error */
3665  }
3666 
3667  handle->dmp_orient_callback = callback; /* set the callback */
3668 
3669  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3670 }
3671 
3684 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_set_enable(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
3685 {
3686  uint8_t res;
3687  uint8_t prev;
3688 
3689  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3690  {
3691  return 2; /* return error */
3692  }
3693  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3694  {
3695  return 3; /* return error */
3696  }
3697  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
3698  {
3699  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
3700 
3701  return 4; /* return error */
3702  }
3703 
3704  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
3705  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3706  {
3707  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl failed */
3708 
3709  return 1; /* return error */
3710  }
3711  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear config */
3712  prev |= enable << 7; /* set config */
3713  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
3714  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3715  {
3716  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write user ctrl failed.\n"); /* write user ctrl failed */
3717 
3718  return 1; /* return error */
3719  }
3720 
3721  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3722 }
3723 
3739 uint8_t mpu6500_dmp_gyro_accel_raw_offset_convert(mpu6500_handle_t *handle,
3740  int32_t gyro_offset_raw[3], int32_t accel_offset_raw[3],
3741  int32_t gyro_offset[3], int32_t accel_offset[3])
3742 {
3743  uint8_t res;
3744  uint8_t accel_conf;
3745  uint8_t gyro_conf;
3746 
3747  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3748  {
3749  return 2; /* return error */
3750  }
3751  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3752  {
3753  return 3; /* return error */
3754  }
3755  if (handle->dmp_inited != 1) /* check dmp initialization */
3756  {
3757  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is not inited.\n"); /* dmp is not inited */
3758 
3759  return 4; /* return error */
3760  }
3761 
3762  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_ACCEL_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&accel_conf, 1); /* read accel config */
3763  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3764  {
3765  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read accel config failed.\n"); /* read accel config failed */
3766 
3767  return 1; /* return error */
3768  }
3769  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_GYRO_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&gyro_conf, 1); /* read gyro config */
3770  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3771  {
3772  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read gyro config failed.\n"); /* read gyro config failed */
3773 
3774  return 1; /* return error */
3775  }
3776  accel_conf = (accel_conf >> 3) & 0x3; /* get the accel conf */
3777  gyro_conf = (gyro_conf >> 3) & 0x3; /* get the gyro conf */
3778  if (accel_conf == 0) /* 2g */
3779  {
3780  accel_offset[0] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[0] * 16384.0f); /* set accel offset 0 */
3781  accel_offset[1] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[1] * 16384.0f); /* set accel offset 1 */
3782  accel_offset[2] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[2] * 16384.0f); /* set accel offset 2 */
3783  }
3784  else if (accel_conf == 1) /* 4g */
3785  {
3786  accel_offset[0] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[0] * 8192.0f); /* set accel offset 0 */
3787  accel_offset[1] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[1] * 8192.0f); /* set accel offset 1 */
3788  accel_offset[2] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[2] * 8192.0f); /* set accel offset 2 */
3789  }
3790  else if (accel_conf == 2) /* 8g */
3791  {
3792  accel_offset[0] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[0] * 4096.0f); /* set accel offset 0 */
3793  accel_offset[1] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[1] * 4096.0f); /* set accel offset 1 */
3794  accel_offset[2] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[2] * 4096.0f); /* set accel offset 2 */
3795  }
3796  else /* 16g */
3797  {
3798  accel_offset[0] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[0] * 2048.0f); /* set accel offset 0 */
3799  accel_offset[1] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[1] * 2048.0f); /* set accel offset 1 */
3800  accel_offset[2] = (int32_t)(accel_offset_raw[2] * 2048.0f); /* set accel offset 2 */
3801  }
3802  if (gyro_conf == 0) /* 250dps */
3803  {
3804  gyro_offset[0] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[0] * 131.f); /* set gyro offset 0 */
3805  gyro_offset[1] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[1] * 131.f); /* set gyro offset 1 */
3806  gyro_offset[2] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[2] * 131.f); /* set gyro offset 2 */
3807  }
3808  else if (gyro_conf == 1) /* 500dps */
3809  {
3810  gyro_offset[0] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[0] * 65.5f); /* set gyro offset 0 */
3811  gyro_offset[1] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[1] * 65.5f); /* set gyro offset 1 */
3812  gyro_offset[2] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[2] * 65.5f); /* set gyro offset 2 */
3813  }
3814  else if (gyro_conf == 2) /* 1000dps */
3815  {
3816  gyro_offset[0] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[0] * 32.8f); /* set gyro offset 0 */
3817  gyro_offset[1] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[1] * 32.8f); /* set gyro offset 1 */
3818  gyro_offset[2] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[2] * 32.8f); /* set gyro offset 2 */
3819  }
3820  else /* 2000dps */
3821  {
3822  gyro_offset[0] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[0] * 16.4f); /* set gyro offset 0 */
3823  gyro_offset[1] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[1] * 16.4f); /* set gyro offset 1 */
3824  gyro_offset[2] = (int32_t)(gyro_offset_raw[2] * 16.4f); /* set gyro offset 2 */
3825  }
3826 
3827  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3828 }
3829 
3839 uint8_t mpu6500_set_interface(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_interface_t interface)
3840 {
3841  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3842  {
3843  return 2; /* return error */
3844  }
3845 
3846  handle->iic_spi = (uint8_t)interface; /* set interface */
3847 
3848  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3849 }
3850 
3860 uint8_t mpu6500_get_interface(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_interface_t *interface)
3861 {
3862  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3863  {
3864  return 2; /* return error */
3865  }
3866 
3867  *interface = (mpu6500_interface_t)(handle->iic_spi); /* get interface */
3868 
3869  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3870 }
3871 
3881 uint8_t mpu6500_set_addr_pin(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_address_t addr_pin)
3882 {
3883  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3884  {
3885  return 2; /* return error */
3886  }
3887 
3888  handle->iic_addr = (uint8_t)addr_pin; /* set iic addr */
3889 
3890  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3891 }
3892 
3902 uint8_t mpu6500_get_addr_pin(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_address_t *addr_pin)
3903 {
3904  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3905  {
3906  return 2; /* return error */
3907  }
3908 
3909  *addr_pin = (mpu6500_address_t)(handle->iic_addr); /* get iic addr */
3910 
3911  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3912 }
3913 
3926 uint8_t mpu6500_init(mpu6500_handle_t *handle)
3927 {
3928  uint8_t res, prev;
3929  uint32_t timeout;
3930 
3931  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3932  {
3933  return 2; /* return error */
3934  }
3935  if (handle->debug_print == NULL) /* check debug_print */
3936  {
3937  return 3; /* return error */
3938  }
3939  if (handle->iic_init == NULL) /* check iic_init */
3940  {
3941  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: iic_init is null.\n"); /* iic_init is null */
3942 
3943  return 3; /* return error */
3944  }
3945  if (handle->iic_deinit == NULL) /* check iic_deinit */
3946  {
3947  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: iic_deinit is null.\n"); /* iic_deinit is null */
3948 
3949  return 3; /* return error */
3950  }
3951  if (handle->iic_read == NULL) /* check iic_read */
3952  {
3953  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: iic_read is null.\n"); /* iic_read is null */
3954 
3955  return 3; /* return error */
3956  }
3957  if (handle->iic_write == NULL) /* check iic_write */
3958  {
3959  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: iic_write is null.\n"); /* iic_write is null */
3960 
3961  return 3; /* return error */
3962  }
3963  if (handle->spi_init == NULL) /* check spi_init */
3964  {
3965  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: spi_init is null.\n"); /* spi_init is null */
3966 
3967  return 3; /* return error */
3968  }
3969  if (handle->spi_deinit == NULL) /* check spi_deinit */
3970  {
3971  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: spi_deinit is null.\n"); /* spi_deinit is null */
3972 
3973  return 3; /* return error */
3974  }
3975  if (handle->spi_read == NULL) /* check spi_read */
3976  {
3977  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: spi_read is null.\n"); /* spi_read is null */
3978 
3979  return 3; /* return error */
3980  }
3981  if (handle->spi_write == NULL) /* check spi_write */
3982  {
3983  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: spi_write is null.\n"); /* spi_write is null */
3984 
3985  return 3; /* return error */
3986  }
3987  if (handle->delay_ms == NULL) /* check delay_ms */
3988  {
3989  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: delay_ms is null.\n"); /* delay_ms is null */
3990 
3991  return 3; /* return error */
3992  }
3993  if (handle->receive_callback == NULL) /* check receive_callback */
3994  {
3995  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: receive_callback is null.\n"); /* receive_callback is null */
3996 
3997  return 3; /* return error */
3998  }
3999 
4000  if (handle->iic_spi == MPU6500_INTERFACE_IIC) /* if iic interface */
4001  {
4002  res = handle->iic_init(); /* iic init */
4003  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
4004  {
4005  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: iic init failed.\n"); /* iic init failed */
4006 
4007  return 1; /* return error */
4008  }
4009  }
4010  else /* if spi interface */
4011  {
4012  res = handle->spi_init(); /* spi init */
4013  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
4014  {
4015  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: spi init failed.\n"); /* spi init failed */
4016 
4017  return 1; /* return error */
4018  }
4019  }
4020 
4021  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_WHO_AM_I, &prev, 1); /* read who am I */
4022  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
4023  {
4024  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read who am i failed.\n"); /* read who am I failed */
4025  (void)a_mpu6500_deinit(handle); /* iic or spi deinit */
4026 
4027  return 5; /* return error */
4028  }
4029  if (prev != 0x70) /* check the id */
4030  {
4031  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: id is invalid.\n"); /* id is invalid */
4032  (void)a_mpu6500_deinit(handle); /* iic or spi deinit */
4033 
4034  return 5; /* return error */
4035  }
4036 
4037  prev = 1 << 7; /* reset the device */
4038  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, &prev, 1); /* write pwr mgmt 1 */
4039  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
4040  {
4041  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write pwr mgmt 1 failed.\n"); /* write pwr mgmt 1 failed */
4042  (void)a_mpu6500_deinit(handle); /* iic or spi deinit */
4043 
4044  return 4; /* return error */
4045  }
4046  handle->delay_ms(10); /* delay 10 ms */
4047  timeout = 100; /* set the timeout 1000 ms */
4048  while (timeout != 0) /* check the timeout */
4049  {
4050  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, &prev, 1); /* read pwr mgmt 1 */
4051  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
4052  {
4053  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read pwr mgmt 1 failed.\n"); /* read pwr mgmt 1 failed */
4054  (void)a_mpu6500_deinit(handle); /* iic or spi deinit */
4055 
4056  return 4; /* return error */
4057  }
4058  if ((prev & (1 << 7)) == 0) /* check the result */
4059  {
4060  handle->inited = 1; /* flag the inited bit */
4061  handle->dmp_inited = 0; /* flag closed */
4062 
4063  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4064  }
4065  handle->delay_ms(10); /* delay 10 ms */
4066  timeout--; /* timeout-- */
4067  }
4068 
4069  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: reset failed.\n"); /* reset failed */
4070 
4071  return 4; /* return error */
4072 }
4073 
4085 uint8_t mpu6500_deinit(mpu6500_handle_t *handle)
4086 {
4087  uint8_t res;
4088  uint8_t prev;
4089 
4090  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4091  {
4092  return 2; /* return error */
4093  }
4094  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4095  {
4096  return 3; /* return error */
4097  }
4098 
4099  prev = (1 << 6) | (1 << 3) | (7 << 0); /* enter sleep mode */
4100  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, &prev, 1); /* write pwr mgmt 1 */
4101  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
4102  {
4103  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write pwr mgmt 1 failed.\n"); /* write pwr mgmt 1 failed */
4104 
4105  return 4; /* return error */
4106  }
4107  res = a_mpu6500_deinit(handle); /* deinit */
4108  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
4109  {
4110  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: deinit failed.\n"); /* deinit failed */
4111 
4112  return 1; /* return error */
4113  }
4114  handle->inited = 0; /* flag closed */
4115  handle->dmp_inited = 0; /* flag closed */
4116 
4117  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4118 }
4119 
4138 uint8_t mpu6500_read(mpu6500_handle_t *handle,
4139  int16_t (*accel_raw)[3], float (*accel_g)[3],
4140  int16_t (*gyro_raw)[3], float (*gyro_dps)[3],
4141  uint16_t *len
4142  )
4143 {
4144  uint8_t res;
4145  uint8_t prev;
4146  uint8_t accel_conf;
4147  uint8_t gyro_conf;
4148 
4149  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4150  {
4151  return 2; /* return error */
4152  }
4153  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4154  {
4155  return 3; /* return error */
4156  }
4157  if ((*len) == 0) /* check length */
4158  {
4159  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: length is zero.\n"); /* length is zero */
4160 
4161  return 4; /* return error */
4162  }
4163  if (handle->dmp_inited != 0) /* check dmp initialization */
4164  {
4165  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: dmp is running.\n"); /* dmp is running */
4166 
4167  return 5; /* return error */
4168  }
4169 
4170  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
4171  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4172  {
4173  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl failed */
4174 
4175  return 1; /* return error */
4176  }
4177  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_ACCEL_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&accel_conf, 1); /* read accel config */
4178  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4179  {
4180  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read accel config failed.\n"); /* read accel config failed */
4181 
4182  return 1; /* return error */
4183  }
4184  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_GYRO_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&gyro_conf, 1); /* read gyro config */
4185  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4186  {
4187  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read gyro config failed.\n"); /* read gyro config failed */
4188 
4189  return 1; /* return error */
4190  }
4191  accel_conf = (accel_conf >> 3) & 0x3; /* get the accel conf */
4192  gyro_conf = (gyro_conf >> 3) & 0x3; /* get the gyro conf */
4193  if ((prev & (1 << 6)) != 0) /* if fifo mode */
4194  {
4195  uint8_t conf;
4196  uint8_t buf[2];
4197  uint16_t count;
4198  uint16_t i;
4199 
4200  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, (uint8_t *)&conf, 1); /* read fifo enable */
4201  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4202  {
4203  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read fifo enable failed.\n"); /* read fifo enable failed */
4204 
4205  return 1; /* return error */
4206  }
4207  if (conf != 0x78) /* check the conf */
4208  {
4209  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: fifo conf is error.\n"); /* fifo conf is error */
4210 
4211  return 6; /* return error */
4212  }
4213 
4214  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_COUNTH, (uint8_t *)buf, 2); /* read fifo count */
4215  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4216  {
4217  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read fifo count failed.\n"); /* read fifo count failed */
4218 
4219  return 1; /* return error */
4220  }
4221 
4222  count = (uint16_t)(((uint16_t)buf[0] << 8) | buf[1]); /* set count */
4223  count = (count < 1024) ? count : 1024; /* just the counter */
4224  count = (count < ((*len) * 12)) ? count : ((*len) * 12); /* just outer buffer size */
4225  count = (count / 12) * 12; /* 12 times */
4226  *len = count / 12; /* set the output length */
4227  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_R_W, handle->buf, count); /* read data */
4228  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4229  {
4230  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read failed.\n"); /* read failed */
4231 
4232  return 1; /* return error */
4233  }
4234  for (i = 0; i < (*len); i++) /* *len times */
4235  {
4236  accel_raw[i][0] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[i * 12 + 0] << 8) |
4237  handle->buf[i * 12 + 1]; /* set raw accel x */
4238  accel_raw[i][1] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[i * 12 + 2] << 8) |
4239  handle->buf[i * 12 + 3]; /* set raw accel y */
4240  accel_raw[i][2] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[i * 12 + 4] << 8) |
4241  handle->buf[i * 12 + 5]; /* set raw accel z */
4242  gyro_raw[i][0] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[i * 12 + 6] << 8) |
4243  handle->buf[i * 12 + 7]; /* set raw gyro x */
4244  gyro_raw[i][1] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[i * 12 + 8] << 8) |
4245  handle->buf[i * 12 + 9]; /* set raw gyro y */
4246  gyro_raw[i][2] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[i * 12 + 10] << 8) |
4247  handle->buf[i * 12 + 11]; /* set raw gyro z */
4248 
4249  if (accel_conf == 0) /* 2g */
4250  {
4251  accel_g[i][0] = (float)(accel_raw[i][0]) / 16384.0f; /* set accel x */
4252  accel_g[i][1] = (float)(accel_raw[i][1]) / 16384.0f; /* set accel y */
4253  accel_g[i][2] = (float)(accel_raw[i][2]) / 16384.0f; /* set accel z */
4254  }
4255  else if (accel_conf == 1) /* 4g */
4256  {
4257  accel_g[i][0] = (float)(accel_raw[i][0]) / 8192.0f; /* set accel x */
4258  accel_g[i][1] = (float)(accel_raw[i][1]) / 8192.0f; /* set accel y */
4259  accel_g[i][2] = (float)(accel_raw[i][2]) / 8192.0f; /* set accel z */
4260  }
4261  else if (accel_conf == 2) /* 8g */
4262  {
4263  accel_g[i][0] = (float)(accel_raw[i][0]) / 4096.0f; /* set accel x */
4264  accel_g[i][1] = (float)(accel_raw[i][1]) / 4096.0f; /* set accel y */
4265  accel_g[i][2] = (float)(accel_raw[i][2]) / 4096.0f; /* set accel z */
4266  }
4267  else /* 16g */
4268  {
4269  accel_g[i][0] = (float)(accel_raw[i][0]) / 2048.0f; /* set accel x */
4270  accel_g[i][1] = (float)(accel_raw[i][1]) / 2048.0f; /* set accel y */
4271  accel_g[i][2] = (float)(accel_raw[i][2]) / 2048.0f; /* set accel z */
4272  }
4273 
4274  if (gyro_conf == 0) /* 250dps */
4275  {
4276  gyro_dps[i][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][0]) / 131.0f; /* set gyro x */
4277  gyro_dps[i][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][1]) / 131.0f; /* set gyro y */
4278  gyro_dps[i][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][2]) / 131.0f; /* set gyro z */
4279  }
4280  else if (gyro_conf == 1) /* 500dps */
4281  {
4282  gyro_dps[i][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][0]) / 65.5f; /* set gyro x */
4283  gyro_dps[i][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][1]) / 65.5f; /* set gyro y */
4284  gyro_dps[i][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][2]) / 65.5f; /* set gyro z */
4285  }
4286  else if (gyro_conf == 2) /* 1000dps */
4287  {
4288  gyro_dps[i][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][0]) / 32.8f; /* set gyro x */
4289  gyro_dps[i][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][1]) / 32.8f; /* set gyro y */
4290  gyro_dps[i][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][2]) / 32.8f; /* set gyro z */
4291  }
4292  else /* 2000dps */
4293  {
4294  gyro_dps[i][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][0]) / 16.4f; /* set gyro x */
4295  gyro_dps[i][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][1]) / 16.4f; /* set gyro y */
4296  gyro_dps[i][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[i][2]) / 16.4f; /* set gyro z */
4297  }
4298  }
4299 
4300  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4301  }
4302  else /* if normal mode */
4303  {
4304  *len = 1; /* set 1 */
4305  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_ACCEL_XOUT_H, handle->buf, 14); /* read data */
4306  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4307  {
4308  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read failed.\n"); /* read failed */
4309 
4310  return 1; /* return error */
4311  }
4312  accel_raw[0][0] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[0] << 8) | handle->buf[1]; /* set raw accel x */
4313  accel_raw[0][1] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[2] << 8) | handle->buf[3]; /* set raw accel y */
4314  accel_raw[0][2] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[4] << 8) | handle->buf[5]; /* set raw accel z */
4315  gyro_raw[0][0] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[8] << 8) | handle->buf[9]; /* set raw gyro x */
4316  gyro_raw[0][1] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[10] << 8) | handle->buf[11]; /* set raw gyro y */
4317  gyro_raw[0][2] = (int16_t)((uint16_t)handle->buf[12] << 8) | handle->buf[13]; /* set raw gyro z */
4318 
4319  if (accel_conf == 0) /* 2g */
4320  {
4321  accel_g[0][0] = (float)(accel_raw[0][0]) / 16384.0f; /* set accel x */
4322  accel_g[0][1] = (float)(accel_raw[0][1]) / 16384.0f; /* set accel y */
4323  accel_g[0][2] = (float)(accel_raw[0][2]) / 16384.0f; /* set accel z */
4324  }
4325  else if (accel_conf == 1) /* 4g */
4326  {
4327  accel_g[0][0] = (float)(accel_raw[0][0]) / 8192.0f; /* set accel x */
4328  accel_g[0][1] = (float)(accel_raw[0][1]) / 8192.0f; /* set accel y */
4329  accel_g[0][2] = (float)(accel_raw[0][2]) / 8192.0f; /* set accel z */
4330  }
4331  else if (accel_conf == 2) /* 8g */
4332  {
4333  accel_g[0][0] = (float)(accel_raw[0][0]) / 4096.0f; /* set accel x */
4334  accel_g[0][1] = (float)(accel_raw[0][1]) / 4096.0f; /* set accel y */
4335  accel_g[0][2] = (float)(accel_raw[0][2]) / 4096.0f; /* set accel z */
4336  }
4337  else /* 16g */
4338  {
4339  accel_g[0][0] = (float)(accel_raw[0][0]) / 2048.0f; /* set accel x */
4340  accel_g[0][1] = (float)(accel_raw[0][1]) / 2048.0f; /* set accel y */
4341  accel_g[0][2] = (float)(accel_raw[0][2]) / 2048.0f; /* set accel z */
4342  }
4343 
4344  if (gyro_conf == 0) /* 250dps */
4345  {
4346  gyro_dps[0][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][0]) / 131.0f; /* set gyro x */
4347  gyro_dps[0][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][1]) / 131.0f; /* set gyro y */
4348  gyro_dps[0][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][2]) / 131.0f; /* set gyro z */
4349  }
4350  else if (gyro_conf == 1) /* 500dps */
4351  {
4352  gyro_dps[0][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][0]) / 65.5f; /* set gyro x */
4353  gyro_dps[0][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][1]) / 65.5f; /* set gyro y */
4354  gyro_dps[0][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][2]) / 65.5f; /* set gyro z */
4355  }
4356  else if (gyro_conf == 2) /* 1000dps */
4357  {
4358  gyro_dps[0][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][0]) / 32.8f; /* set gyro x */
4359  gyro_dps[0][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][1]) / 32.8f; /* set gyro y */
4360  gyro_dps[0][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][2]) / 32.8f; /* set gyro z */
4361  }
4362  else /* 2000dps */
4363  {
4364  gyro_dps[0][0] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][0]) / 16.4f; /* set gyro x */
4365  gyro_dps[0][1] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][1]) / 16.4f; /* set gyro y */
4366  gyro_dps[0][2] = (float)(gyro_raw[0][2]) / 16.4f; /* set gyro z */
4367  }
4368 
4369  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4370  }
4371 }
4372 
4385 uint8_t mpu6500_read_temperature(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t (*raw), float *degrees)
4386 {
4387  uint8_t res;
4388  uint8_t buf[2];
4389 
4390  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4391  {
4392  return 2; /* return error */
4393  }
4394  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4395  {
4396  return 3; /* return error */
4397  }
4398 
4399  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_TEMP_OUT_H, buf, 2); /* read data */
4400  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4401  {
4402  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read failed.\n"); /* read failed */
4403 
4404  return 1; /* return error */
4405  }
4406  *raw = (int16_t)((uint16_t)buf[0] << 8) | buf[1]; /* get the raw */
4407  *degrees = (float)(*raw) / 321.0f + 21.0f; /* convert the degrees */
4408 
4409  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4410 }
4411 
4422 uint8_t mpu6500_irq_handler(mpu6500_handle_t *handle)
4423 {
4424  uint8_t res;
4425  uint8_t prev;
4426 
4427  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4428  {
4429  return 2; /* return error */
4430  }
4431  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4432  {
4433  return 3; /* return error */
4434  }
4435 
4436  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_STATUS, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
4437  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4438  {
4439  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read int status failed.\n"); /* read int status failed */
4440 
4441  return 1; /* return error */
4442  }
4443  if ((prev & (1 << MPU6500_INTERRUPT_MOTION)) != 0) /* if motion */
4444  {
4445  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* if receive callback */
4446  {
4447  handle->receive_callback(MPU6500_INTERRUPT_MOTION); /* run callback */
4448  }
4449  }
4450  if ((prev & (1 << MPU6500_INTERRUPT_FIFO_OVERFLOW)) != 0) /* if fifo overflow */
4451  {
4452  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* if receive callback */
4453  {
4454  handle->receive_callback(MPU6500_INTERRUPT_FIFO_OVERFLOW); /* run callback */
4455  }
4456  (void)a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
4457  }
4458  if ((prev & (1 << MPU6500_INTERRUPT_FSYNC_INT)) != 0) /* if fsync int */
4459  {
4460  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* if receive callback */
4461  {
4462  handle->receive_callback(MPU6500_INTERRUPT_FSYNC_INT); /* run callback */
4463  }
4464  }
4465  if ((prev & (1 << MPU6500_INTERRUPT_DMP)) != 0) /* if dmp */
4466  {
4467  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* if receive callback */
4468  {
4469  handle->receive_callback(MPU6500_INTERRUPT_DMP); /* run callback */
4470  }
4471  }
4472  if ((prev & (1 << MPU6500_INTERRUPT_DATA_READY)) != 0) /* if data ready */
4473  {
4474  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* if receive callback */
4475  {
4476  handle->receive_callback(MPU6500_INTERRUPT_DATA_READY); /* run callback */
4477  }
4478  }
4479 
4480  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4481 }
4482 
4494 uint8_t mpu6500_set_fifo(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
4495 {
4496  uint8_t res;
4497  uint8_t prev;
4498 
4499  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4500  {
4501  return 2; /* return error */
4502  }
4503  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4504  {
4505  return 3; /* return error */
4506  }
4507 
4508  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
4509  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4510  {
4511  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl failed */
4512 
4513  return 1; /* return error */
4514  }
4515  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear config */
4516  prev |= enable << 6; /* set config */
4517  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
4518  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4519  {
4520  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write user ctrl failed.\n"); /* write user ctrl failed */
4521 
4522  return 1; /* return error */
4523  }
4524 
4525  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4526 }
4527 
4539 uint8_t mpu6500_get_fifo(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
4540 {
4541  uint8_t res;
4542  uint8_t prev;
4543 
4544  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4545  {
4546  return 2; /* return error */
4547  }
4548  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4549  {
4550  return 3; /* return error */
4551  }
4552 
4553  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
4554  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4555  {
4556  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl failed */
4557 
4558  return 1; /* return error */
4559  }
4560  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 6) & 0x01); /* get bool */
4561 
4562  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4563 }
4564 
4575 uint8_t mpu6500_force_fifo_reset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle)
4576 {
4577  uint8_t res;
4578 
4579  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4580  {
4581  return 2; /* return error */
4582  }
4583  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4584  {
4585  return 3; /* return error */
4586  }
4587 
4588  res = a_mpu6500_reset_fifo(handle); /* reset the fifo */
4589  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4590  {
4591  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: force reset fifo failed.\n"); /* force reset fifo failed */
4592 
4593  return 1; /* return error */
4594  }
4595 
4596  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4597 }
4598 
4610 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_master(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
4611 {
4612  uint8_t res;
4613  uint8_t prev;
4614 
4615  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4616  {
4617  return 2; /* return error */
4618  }
4619  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4620  {
4621  return 3; /* return error */
4622  }
4623 
4624  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
4625  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4626  {
4627  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl failed */
4628 
4629  return 1; /* return error */
4630  }
4631  prev &= ~(1 << 5); /* clear config */
4632  prev |= enable << 5; /* set config */
4633  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
4634  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4635  {
4636  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write user ctrl failed.\n"); /* write user ctrl failed */
4637 
4638  return 1; /* return error */
4639  }
4640 
4641  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4642 }

4671  {
4672  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl failed */
4673 
4674  return 1; /* return error */
4675  }
4676  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 5) & 0x01); /* get bool */
4677 
4678  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4679 }

4692 uint8_t mpu6500_set_disable_iic_slave(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
4693 {

4695  uint8_t prev;
4696 
4697  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4698  {
4699  return 2; /* return error */
4700  }

4702  {
4703  return 3; /* return error */
4704  }
4705 
4706  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
4707  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4708  {
4709  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl failed */
4710 
4711  return 1; /* return error */
4712  }
4713  prev &= ~(1 << 4); /* clear config */
4714  prev |= enable << 4; /* set config */
4715  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
4716  if (res != 0) /* check result */

4718  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write user ctrl failed.\n"); /* write user ctrl failed */
4719 
4720  return 1; /* return error */
4721  }

4723  return 0; /* success return 0 */

4773 uint8_t mpu6500_fifo_reset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle)
4774 {
4775  uint8_t res;
4776  uint8_t prev;
4777 
4778  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4779  {
4780  return 2; /* return error */
4781  }
4782  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4783  {
4784  return 3; /* return error */
4785  }
4786 
4787  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
4788  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4789  {
4790  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl failed */
4791 
4792  return 1; /* return error */
4793  }
4794  prev &= ~(1 << 2); /* clear config */
4795  prev |= 1 << 2; /* set config */
4796  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
4797  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4798  {
4799  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write user ctrl failed.\n"); /* write user ctrl failed */
4800 
4801  return 1; /* return error */
4802  }
4803 
4804  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4805 }

4854 uint8_t mpu6500_iic_master_reset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle)
4855 {
4856  uint8_t res;
4857  uint8_t prev;
4858 
4859  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4860  {
4861  return 2; /* return error */
4862  }
4863  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4864  {
4865  return 3; /* return error */
4866  }
4867 
4868  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
4869  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4870  {
4871  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl failed */
4872 
4873  return 1; /* return error */
4874  }
4875  prev &= ~(1 << 1); /* clear config */
4876  prev |= 1 << 1; /* set config */
4877  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
4878  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4879  {
4880  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write user ctrl failed.\n"); /* write user ctrl failed */
4881 
4882  return 1; /* return error */
4883  }
4884 
4885  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4886 }

4936 {

4938  uint8_t prev;
4939 
4940  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4941  {
4942  return 2; /* return error */
4943  }

4945  {
4946  return 3; /* return error */
4947  }
4948 
4949  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
4950  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4951  {
4952  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read user ctrl failed.\n"); /* read user ctrl failed */
4953 
4954  return 1; /* return error */
4955  }
4956  prev &= ~(1 << 0); /* clear config */
4957  prev |= 1 << 0; /* set config */
4958  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_USER_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
4959  if (res != 0) /* check result */

4962 
4963  return 1; /* return error */
4964  }

5016 uint8_t mpu6500_device_reset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle)
5017 {
5018  uint8_t res;
5019  uint8_t prev;
5020 
5021  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5022  {
5023  return 2; /* return error */
5024  }
5025  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5026  {
5027  return 3; /* return error */
5028  }
5029 
5030  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5031  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5032  {
5033  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 1 failed.\n"); /* read power management 1 failed */
5034 
5035  return 1; /* return error */
5036  }
5037  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear config */
5038  prev |= 1 << 7; /* set config */
5039  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
5040  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5041  {
5042  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write power management 1 failed.\n"); /* write power management 1 failed */
5043 
5044  return 1; /* return error */
5045  }
5046 
5047  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5048 }
5049 
5061 uint8_t mpu6500_get_device_reset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
5062 {
5063  uint8_t res;
5064  uint8_t prev;
5065 
5066  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5067  {
5068  return 2; /* return error */
5069  }
5070  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5071  {
5072  return 3; /* return error */
5073  }
5074 
5075  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5076  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5077  {
5078  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 1 failed.\n"); /* read power management 1 failed */
5079 
5080  return 1; /* return error */
5081  }
5082  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x01); /* get bool */
5083 
5084  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5085 }
5086 
5098 uint8_t mpu6500_set_clock_source(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_clock_source_t clock_source)
5099 {
5100  uint8_t res;
5101  uint8_t prev;
5102 
5103  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5104  {
5105  return 2; /* return error */
5106  }
5107  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5108  {
5109  return 3; /* return error */
5110  }
5111 
5112  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5113  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5114  {
5115  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 1 failed.\n"); /* read power management 1 failed */
5116 
5117  return 1; /* return error */
5118  }
5119  prev &= ~(0x7 << 0); /* clear config */
5120  prev |= clock_source << 0; /* set config */
5121  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
5122  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5123  {
5124  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write power management 1 failed.\n"); /* write power management 1 failed */
5125 
5126  return 1; /* return error */
5127  }
5128 
5129  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5130 }
5131 
5143 uint8_t mpu6500_get_clock_source(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_clock_source_t *clock_source)
5144 {
5145  uint8_t res;
5146  uint8_t prev;
5147 
5148  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5149  {
5150  return 2; /* return error */
5151  }
5152  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5153  {
5154  return 3; /* return error */
5155  }
5156 
5157  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5158  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5159  {
5160  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 1 failed.\n"); /* read power management 1 failed */
5161 
5162  return 1; /* return error */
5163  }
5164  *clock_source = (mpu6500_clock_source_t)((prev >> 0) & (0x7)); /* get clock source */
5165 
5166  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5167 }
5168 
5180 uint8_t mpu6500_set_ptat(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
5181 {
5182  uint8_t res;
5183  uint8_t prev;
5184 
5185  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5186  {
5187  return 2; /* return error */
5188  }
5189  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5190  {
5191  return 3; /* return error */
5192  }
5193 
5194  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5195  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5196  {
5197  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 1 failed.\n"); /* read power management 1 failed */
5198 
5199  return 1; /* return error */
5200  }
5201  prev &= ~(1 << 3); /* clear config */
5202  prev |= (!enable) << 3; /* set config */
5203  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
5204  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5205  {
5206  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write power management 1 failed.\n"); /* write power management 1 failed */
5207 
5208  return 1; /* return error */
5209  }
5210 
5211  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5212 }
5213 
5225 uint8_t mpu6500_get_ptat(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
5226 {
5227  uint8_t res;
5228  uint8_t prev;
5229 
5230  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5231  {
5232  return 2; /* return error */
5233  }
5234  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5235  {
5236  return 3; /* return error */
5237  }
5238 
5239  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5240  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5241  {
5242  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 1 failed.\n"); /* read power management 1 failed */
5243 
5244  return 1; /* return error */
5245  }
5246  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)(!((prev >> 3) & (0x1))); /* get bool */
5247 
5248  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5249 }

5262 uint8_t mpu6500_set_cycle_wake_up(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
5263 {
5264  uint8_t res;
5265  uint8_t prev;
5266 
5267  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5268  {
5269  return 2; /* return error */
5270  }
5271  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5272  {
5273  return 3; /* return error */
5274  }
5275 
5276  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5277  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5278  {
5279  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 1 failed.\n"); /* read power management 1 failed */
5280 
5281  return 1; /* return error */
5282  }
5283  prev &= ~(1 << 5); /* clear config */
5284  prev |= enable << 5; /* set config */
5285  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
5286  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5287  {
5288  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write power management 1 failed.\n"); /* write power management 1 failed */
5289 
5290  return 1; /* return error */
5291  }
5292 
5293  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5294 }

5361  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 1 failed.\n"); /* read power management 1 failed */
5362 
5363  return 1; /* return error */
5364  }

5443  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 1 failed.\n"); /* read power management 1 failed */
5444 
5445  return 1; /* return error */
5446  }

5509 uint8_t mpu6500_set_standby_mode(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_source_t source, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
5510 {
5511  uint8_t res;
5512  uint8_t prev;
5513 
5514  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5515  {
5516  return 2; /* return error */
5517  }
5518  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5519  {
5520  return 3; /* return error */
5521  }
5522 
5523  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_2, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5524  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5525  {
5526  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 2 failed.\n"); /* read power management 2 failed */
5527 
5528  return 1; /* return error */
5529  }
5530  prev &= ~(1 << source); /* clear config */
5531  prev |= enable << source; /* set config */
5532  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_2, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
5533  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5534  {
5535  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write power management 2 failed.\n"); /* write power management 2 failed */
5536 
5537  return 1; /* return error */
5538  }
5539 
5540  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5541 }

5592 uint8_t mpu6500_get_fifo_count(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint16_t* count)
5593 {
5594  uint8_t res;
5595  uint8_t buf[2];
5596 
5597  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5598  {
5599  return 2; /* return error */
5600  }
5601  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5602  {
5603  return 3; /* return error */
5604  }
5605 
5606  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_COUNTH, (uint8_t *)buf, 2); /* read fifo count */
5607  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5608  {
5609  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read fifo count failed.\n"); /* read fifo count failed */
5610 
5611  return 1; /* return error */
5612  }
5613  *count = (uint16_t)(((uint16_t)buf[0] << 8) | buf[1]); /* set count */
5614 
5615  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5616 }
5617 
5630 uint8_t mpu6500_fifo_get(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
5631 {
5632  uint8_t res;
5633 
5634  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5635  {
5636  return 2; /* return error */
5637  }
5638  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5639  {
5640  return 3; /* return error */
5641  }
5642 
5643  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_R_W, buf, len); /* read fifo */
5644  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5645  {
5646  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: fifo read failed.\n"); /* fifo read failed */
5647 
5648  return 1; /* return error */
5649  }
5650 
5651  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5652 }

5701 uint8_t mpu6500_set_signal_path_reset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_signal_path_reset_t path)
5702 {
5703  uint8_t res;
5704  uint8_t prev;
5705 
5706  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5707  {
5708  return 2; /* return error */
5709  }
5710  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5711  {
5712  return 3; /* return error */
5713  }
5714 
5715  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_SIGNAL_PATH_RESET, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5716  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5717  {
5718  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read signal path reset failed.\n"); /* read signal path reset failed */
5719 
5720  return 1; /* return error */
5721  }
5722  prev &= ~(1 << path); /* clear config */
5723  prev |= 1 << path; /* set config */
5724  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_SIGNAL_PATH_RESET, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
5725  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5726  {
5727  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write signal path reset failed.\n"); /* write signal path reset failed */
5728 
5729  return 1; /* return error */
5730  }
5731 
5732  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5733 }

5816 uint8_t mpu6500_set_extern_sync(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_extern_sync_t sync)
5817 {
5818  uint8_t res;
5819  uint8_t prev;
5820 
5821  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5822  {
5823  return 2; /* return error */
5824  }
5825  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5826  {
5827  return 3; /* return error */
5828  }
5829 
5830  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5831  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5832  {
5833  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read config failed.\n"); /* read config failed */
5834 
5835  return 1; /* return error */
5836  }
5837  prev &= ~(0x7 << 3); /* clear config */
5838  prev |= sync << 3; /* set config */
5839  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
5840  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5841  {
5842  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write config failed.\n"); /* write config failed */
5843 
5844  return 1; /* return error */
5845  }
5846 
5847  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5848 }

5867  {
5868  return 2; /* return error */
5869  }

5871  {
5872  return 3; /* return error */
5873  }
5874 
5875  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */

5877  {
5878  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read config failed.\n"); /* read config failed */
5879 
5880  return 1; /* return error */
5881  }
5882  *sync = (mpu6500_extern_sync_t)((prev >> 3) & 0x7); /* get the extern sync */
5883 
5884  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5885 }

5898 uint8_t mpu6500_set_low_pass_filter(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_low_pass_filter_t filter)
5899 {
5900  uint8_t res;
5901  uint8_t prev;
5902 
5903  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5904  {
5905  return 2; /* return error */
5906  }
5907  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5908  {
5909  return 3; /* return error */
5910  }
5911 
5912  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5913  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5914  {
5915  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read config failed.\n"); /* read config failed */
5916 
5917  return 1; /* return error */
5918  }
5919  prev &= ~(0x7 << 0); /* clear config */
5920  prev |= filter << 0; /* set config */
5921  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
5922  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5923  {
5924  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write config failed.\n"); /* write config failed */
5925 
5926  return 1; /* return error */
5927  }
5928 
5929  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5930 }
5931 
5943 uint8_t mpu6500_get_low_pass_filter(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_low_pass_filter_t *filter)
5944 {
5945  uint8_t res;
5946  uint8_t prev;
5947 
5948  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5949  {
5950  return 2; /* return error */
5951  }
5952  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5953  {
5954  return 3; /* return error */
5955  }
5956 
5957  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5958  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5959  {
5960  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read config failed.\n"); /* read config failed */
5961 
5962  return 1; /* return error */
5963  }
5964  *filter = (mpu6500_low_pass_filter_t)((prev >> 0) & 0x7); /* get the filter */
5965 
5966  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5967 }
5968 
5980 uint8_t mpu6500_set_fifo_mode(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_fifo_mode mode)
5981 {
5982  uint8_t res;
5983  uint8_t prev;
5984 
5985  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5986  {
5987  return 2; /* return error */
5988  }
5989  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5990  {
5991  return 3; /* return error */
5992  }
5993 
5994  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
5995  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5996  {
5997  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read config failed.\n"); /* read config failed */
5998 
5999  return 1; /* return error */
6000  }
6001  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear config */
6002  prev |= mode << 6; /* set config */
6003  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
6004  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6005  {
6006  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write config failed.\n"); /* write config failed */
6007 
6008  return 1; /* return error */
6009  }
6010 
6011  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6012 }

6063 uint8_t mpu6500_set_gyroscope_test(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_axis_t axis, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
6064 {
6065  uint8_t res;
6066  uint8_t prev;
6067 
6068  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6069  {
6070  return 2; /* return error */
6071  }
6072  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6073  {
6074  return 3; /* return error */
6075  }
6076 
6077  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_GYRO_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read gyroscope config */
6078  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6079  {
6080  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read gyroscope config failed.\n"); /* read gyroscope config failed */
6081 
6082  return 1; /* return error */
6083  }
6084  prev &= ~(1 << axis); /* clear config */
6085  prev |= enable << axis; /* set config */
6086  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_GYRO_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write gyroscope config */
6087  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6088  {
6089  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write gyroscope config failed.\n"); /* write gyroscope config failed */
6090 
6091  return 1; /* return error */
6092  }
6093 
6094  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6095 }

6147 {

6164 
6165  return 1; /* return error */
6166  }

6168  prev |= range << 3; /* set config */
6169  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_GYRO_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write gyroscope config */

6175  }

6229 uint8_t mpu6500_set_gyroscope_choice(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t choice)
6230 {
6231  uint8_t res;
6232  uint8_t prev;
6233 
6234  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6235  {
6236  return 2; /* return error */
6237  }
6238  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6239  {
6240  return 3; /* return error */
6241  }
6242  if (choice > 3) /* check the choice */
6243  {
6244  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: choice > 3.\n"); /* choice > 3 */
6245 
6246  return 4; /* return error */
6247  }
6248 
6249  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_GYRO_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read gyroscope config */
6250  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6251  {
6252  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read gyroscope config failed.\n"); /* read gyroscope config failed */
6253 
6254  return 1; /* return error */
6255  }
6256  prev &= ~(3 << 0); /* clear config */
6257  prev |= choice << 0; /* set config */
6258  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_GYRO_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write gyroscope config */
6259  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6260  {
6261  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write gyroscope config failed.\n"); /* write gyroscope config failed */
6262 
6263  return 1; /* return error */
6264  }
6265 
6266  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6267 }
6268

6291  return 3; /* return error */
6292  }

6294  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_GYRO_CONFIG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read gyroscope config */

6296  {
6297  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read gyroscope config failed.\n"); /* read gyroscope config failed */
6298 
6299  return 1; /* return error */
6300  }
6301  *choice = prev & 0x03; /* get the choice */
6302 
6303  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6304 }

6546  }

6562  return 1; /* return error */
6563  }

6699 uint8_t mpu6500_set_low_power_accel_output_rate(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_low_power_accel_output_rate_t rate)
6700 {
6701  uint8_t res;
6702  uint8_t prev;
6703 
6704  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6705  {
6706  return 2; /* return error */
6707  }
6708  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6709  {
6710  return 3; /* return error */
6711  }
6712 
6713  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_LP_ACCEL_ODR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
6714  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6715  {
6716  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read lp accelerometer odr failed.\n"); /* read lp accelerometer odr failed */
6717 
6718  return 1; /* return error */
6719  }
6720  prev &= ~(0xF << 0); /* clear config */
6721  prev |= rate << 0; /* set config */
6722  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_LP_ACCEL_ODR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
6723  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6724  {
6725  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write lp accelerometer odr failed.\n"); /* write lp accelerometer odr failed */
6726 
6727  return 1; /* return error */
6728  }
6729 
6730  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6731 }
6732 
6744 uint8_t mpu6500_get_low_power_accel_output_rate(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_low_power_accel_output_rate_t *rate)
6745 {
6746  uint8_t res;
6747  uint8_t prev;
6748 
6749  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6750  {
6751  return 2; /* return error */
6752  }
6753  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6754  {
6755  return 3; /* return error */
6756  }
6757 
6758  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_LP_ACCEL_ODR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
6759  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6760  {
6761  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read lp accelerometer odr failed.\n"); /* read lp accelerometer odr failed */
6762 
6763  return 1; /* return error */
6764  }
6765  *rate = (mpu6500_low_power_accel_output_rate_t)(prev & 0xF); /* get the rate */
6766 
6767  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6768 }
6769 
6781 uint8_t mpu6500_set_wake_on_motion(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
6782 {
6783  uint8_t res;
6784  uint8_t prev;
6785 
6786  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6787  {
6788  return 2; /* return error */
6789  }
6790  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6791  {
6792  return 3; /* return error */
6793  }
6794 
6795  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_MOT_DETECT_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
6796  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6797  {
6798  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read motion detect ctrl failed.\n"); /* read motion detect ctrl failed */
6799 
6800  return 1; /* return error */
6801  }
6802  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear config */
6803  prev |= enable << 7; /* set config */
6804  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_MOT_DETECT_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
6805  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6806  {
6807  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write motion detect ctrl failed.\n"); /* write motion detect ctrl failed */
6808 
6809  return 1; /* return error */
6810  }
6811 
6812  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6813 }
6814

6841  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6842  {
6843  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read motion detect ctrl failed.\n"); /* read motion detect ctrl failed */
6844 
6845  return 1; /* return error */
6846  }
6847  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x01); /* get the bool */
6848

6850 }

6867

6869  {
6870  return 2; /* return error */
6871  }

6875  }
6876 
6877  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_MOT_DETECT_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */

6879  {
6880  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read motion detect ctrl failed.\n"); /* read motion detect ctrl failed */
6881 
6882  return 1; /* return error */
6883  }
6884  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear config */
6885  prev |= enable << 6; /* set config */
6886  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_MOT_DETECT_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */

6889  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write motion detect ctrl failed.\n"); /* write motion detect ctrl failed */
6890 
6891  return 1; /* return error */
6892  }
6893 
6894  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6895 }

6946 uint8_t mpu6500_set_fifo_enable(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_fifo_t fifo, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
6947 {
6948  uint8_t res;
6949  uint8_t prev;
6950 
6951  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6952  {
6953  return 2; /* return error */
6954  }
6955  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6956  {
6957  return 3; /* return error */
6958  }
6959 
6960  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read fifo enable config */
6961  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6962  {
6963  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read fifo enable config failed.\n"); /* read fifo enable config failed */
6964 
6965  return 1; /* return error */
6966  }
6967  prev &= ~(1 << fifo); /* clear config */
6968  prev |= enable << fifo; /* set config */
6969  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write fifo enable config */
6970  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6971  {
6972  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write fifo enable config failed.\n"); /* write fifo enable config failed */
6973 
6974  return 1; /* return error */
6975  }
6976 
6977  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6978 }

6998  {
6999  return 2; /* return error */
7000  }
7001  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7002  {
7003  return 3; /* return error */
7004  }
7005 
7006  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read fifo enable config */
7007  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7008  {
7009  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read fifo enable config failed.\n"); /* read fifo enable config failed */
7010 
7011  return 1; /* return error */
7012  }
7013  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> fifo) & 0x01); /* get the bool */
7014 
7015  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7016 }

7029 uint8_t mpu6500_set_interrupt_level(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_pin_level_t level)
7030 {
7031  uint8_t res;
7032  uint8_t prev;
7033 
7034  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7035  {
7036  return 2; /* return error */
7037  }
7038  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7039  {
7040  return 3; /* return error */
7041  }
7042 
7043  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin config */
7044  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7045  {
7046  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7047 
7048  return 1; /* return error */
7049  }
7050  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear config */
7051  prev |= level << 7; /* set config */
7052  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write interrupt pin */
7053  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7054  {
7055  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* write interrupt pin failed */
7056 
7057  return 1; /* return error */
7058  }
7059 
7060  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7061 }
7062

7075 {
7076  uint8_t res;
7077  uint8_t prev;
7078 
7079  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7080  {
7081  return 2; /* return error */
7082  }
7083  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7084  {
7085  return 3; /* return error */
7086  }
7087 
7088  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin config */
7089  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7090  {
7091  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7092 
7093  return 1; /* return error */
7094  }
7095  *level = (mpu6500_pin_level_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x01); /* get the level */
7096 
7097  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7098 }

7111 uint8_t mpu6500_set_interrupt_pin_type(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_pin_type_t type)
7112 {
7113  uint8_t res;
7114  uint8_t prev;
7115 
7116  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7117  {
7118  return 2; /* return error */
7119  }
7120  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7121  {
7122  return 3; /* return error */
7123  }
7124 
7125  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin config */
7126  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7127  {
7128  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7129 
7130  return 1; /* return error */
7131  }
7132  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear config */
7133  prev |= type << 6; /* set config */
7134  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write interrupt pin */
7135  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7136  {
7137  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* write interrupt pin failed */
7138 
7139  return 1; /* return error */
7140  }
7141 
7142  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7143 }
7144 
7156 uint8_t mpu6500_get_interrupt_pin_type(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_pin_type_t *type)
7157 {
7158  uint8_t res;
7159  uint8_t prev;
7160 
7161  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7162  {
7163  return 2; /* return error */
7164  }
7165  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7166  {
7167  return 3; /* return error */
7168  }
7169 
7170  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin config */
7171  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7172  {
7173  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7174 
7175  return 1; /* return error */
7176  }
7177  *type = (mpu6500_pin_type_t)((prev >> 6) & 0x01); /* get the pin type */
7178 
7179  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7180 }
