7193 uint8_t mpu6500_set_interrupt_latch(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
7194 {
7195  uint8_t res;
7196  uint8_t prev;
7197 
7198  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7199  {
7200  return 2; /* return error */
7201  }
7202  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7203  {
7204  return 3; /* return error */
7205  }
7206 
7207  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin config */
7208  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7209  {
7210  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7211 
7212  return 1; /* return error */
7213  }
7214  prev &= ~(1 << 5); /* clear config */
7215  prev |= (!enable) << 5; /* set config */
7216  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write interrupt pin */
7217  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7218  {
7219  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* write interrupt pin failed */
7220 
7221  return 1; /* return error */
7222  }
7223 
7224  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7225 }
7226 
7238 uint8_t mpu6500_get_interrupt_latch(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
7239 {
7240  uint8_t res;
7241  uint8_t prev;
7242 
7243  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7244  {
7245  return 2; /* return error */
7246  }
7247  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7248  {
7249  return 3; /* return error */
7250  }
7251 
7252  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin config */
7253  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7254  {
7255  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7256 
7257  return 1; /* return error */
7258  }
7259  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)(!((prev >> 5) & 0x01)); /* get the bool */
7260 
7261  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7262 }
7263

7276 {
7277  uint8_t res;

7279 
7280  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */

7283  }

7285  {
7286  return 3; /* return error */
7287  }
7288 
7289  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin config */
7290  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7291  {
7292  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7293 
7294  return 1; /* return error */
7295  }
7296  prev &= ~(1 << 4); /* clear config */
7297  prev |= enable << 4; /* set config */
7298  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write interrupt pin */
7299  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7300  {
7301  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* write interrupt pin failed */
7302 
7303  return 1; /* return error */
7304  }
7305 
7306  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7307 }

7357 uint8_t mpu6500_set_fsync_interrupt_level(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_pin_level_t level)
7358 {
7359  uint8_t res;
7360  uint8_t prev;
7361 
7362  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7363  {
7364  return 2; /* return error */
7365  }
7366  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7367  {
7368  return 3; /* return error */
7369  }
7370 
7371  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin config */
7372  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7373  {
7374  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7375 
7376  return 1; /* return error */
7377  }
7378  prev &= ~(1 << 3); /* clear config */
7379  prev |= level << 3; /* set config */
7380  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write interrupt pin */
7381  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7382  {
7383  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* write interrupt pin failed */
7384 
7385  return 1; /* return error */
7386  }
7387 
7388  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7389 }

7439 uint8_t mpu6500_set_fsync_interrupt(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
7440 {
7441  uint8_t res;
7442  uint8_t prev;
7443 
7444  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7445  {
7446  return 2; /* return error */
7447  }
7448  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7449  {
7450  return 3; /* return error */
7451  }
7452 
7453  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin config */
7454  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7455  {
7456  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7457 
7458  return 1; /* return error */
7459  }
7460  prev &= ~(1 << 2); /* clear config */
7461  prev |= enable << 2; /* set config */
7462  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write interrupt pin */
7463  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7464  {
7465  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* write interrupt pin failed */
7466 
7467  return 1; /* return error */
7468  }
7469 
7470  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7471 }

7500  {
7501  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7502 
7503  return 1; /* return error */
7504  }
7505  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 2) & 0x01); /* get the bool */
7506 
7507  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7508 }

7521 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_bypass(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
7522 {
7523  uint8_t res;
7524  uint8_t prev;
7525 
7526  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7527  {
7528  return 2; /* return error */
7529  }
7530  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7531  {
7532  return 3; /* return error */
7533  }
7534 
7535  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin */
7536  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7537  {
7538  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7539 
7540  return 1; /* return error */
7541  }
7542  prev &= ~(1 << 1); /* clear config */
7543  prev |= enable << 1; /* set config */
7544  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write interrupt pin */
7545  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7546  {
7547  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* write interrupt pin failed */
7548 
7549  return 1; /* return error */
7550  }
7551 
7552  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7553 }
7554 
7566 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_bypass(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
7567 {
7568  uint8_t res;
7569  uint8_t prev;
7570 
7571  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7572  {
7573  return 2; /* return error */
7574  }
7575  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7576  {
7577  return 3; /* return error */
7578  }
7579 
7580  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_PIN_CFG, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt pin */
7581  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7582  {
7583  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt pin failed.\n"); /* read interrupt pin failed */
7584 
7585  return 1; /* return error */
7586  }
7587  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 1) & 0x01); /* get the bool */
7588 
7589  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7590 }
7591 
7604 uint8_t mpu6500_set_interrupt(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_interrupt_t type, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
7605 {
7606  uint8_t res;
7607  uint8_t prev;
7608 
7609  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7610  {
7611  return 2; /* return error */
7612  }
7613  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7614  {
7615  return 3; /* return error */
7616  }
7617 
7618  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_ENABLE, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt enable */
7619  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7620  {
7621  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt enable failed.\n"); /* read interrupt enable failed */
7622 
7623  return 1; /* return error */
7624  }
7625  prev &= ~(1 << type); /* clear config */
7626  prev |= enable << type; /* set config */
7627  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_ENABLE, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write interrupt enable */
7628  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7629  {
7630  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write interrupt enable failed.\n"); /* write interrupt enable failed */
7631 
7632  return 1; /* return error */
7633  }
7634 
7635  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7636 }
7637 
7650 uint8_t mpu6500_get_interrupt(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_interrupt_t type, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
7651 {
7652  uint8_t res;
7653  uint8_t prev;
7654 
7655  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7656  {
7657  return 2; /* return error */
7658  }
7659  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7660  {
7661  return 3; /* return error */
7662  }
7663 
7664  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_ENABLE, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read interrupt enable */
7665  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7666  {
7667  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt enable failed.\n"); /* read interrupt enable failed */
7668 
7669  return 1; /* return error */
7670  }
7671  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> type) & 0x01); /* get the bool */
7672 
7673  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7674 }
7675 
7687 uint8_t mpu6500_get_interrupt_status(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t *status)
7688 {
7689  uint8_t res;
7690 
7691  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7692  {
7693  return 2; /* return error */
7694  }
7695  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7696  {
7697  return 3; /* return error */
7698  }
7699 
7700  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_INT_STATUS, (uint8_t *)status, 1); /* read interrupt status */
7701  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7702  {
7703  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read interrupt status failed.\n"); /* read interrupt status failed */
7704 
7705  return 1; /* return error */
7706  }
7707 
7708  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7709 }
7710 
7722 uint8_t mpu6500_set_gyroscope_x_test(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t data)
7723 {
7724  uint8_t res;
7725 
7726  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7727  {
7728  return 2; /* return error */
7729  }
7730  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7731  {
7732  return 3; /* return error */
7733  }
7734 
7735  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_SELF_TEST_X_GYRO, (uint8_t *)&data, 1); /* write self test x */
7736  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7737  {
7738  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write self test x failed.\n"); /* write self test x failed */
7739 
7740  return 1; /* return error */
7741  }
7742 
7743  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7744 }

8130 
8142 uint8_t mpu6500_set_accelerometer_x_offset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t offset)
8143 {
8144  uint8_t res;
8145  uint8_t buf[2];
8146 
8147  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8148  {
8149  return 2; /* return error */
8150  }
8151  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8152  {
8153  return 3; /* return error */
8154  }
8155 
8156  buf[0] = (offset >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set high */
8157  buf[1] = (offset >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set low */
8158  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_XA_OFFSET_H, buf, 2); /* write xa offset */
8159  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8160  {
8161  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write xa offset failed.\n"); /* write xa offset failed*/
8162 
8163  return 1; /* return error */
8164  }
8165 
8166  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8167 }
8168 
8180 uint8_t mpu6500_get_accelerometer_x_offset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t *offset)
8181 {
8182  uint8_t res;
8183  uint8_t buf[2];
8184 
8185  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8186  {
8187  return 2; /* return error */
8188  }
8189  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8190  {
8191  return 3; /* return error */
8192  }
8193 
8194  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_XA_OFFSET_H, buf, 2); /* read xa offset */
8195  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8196  {
8197  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read xa offset failed.\n"); /* read xa offset failed*/
8198 
8199  return 1; /* return error */
8200  }
8201  *offset = (int16_t)(((uint16_t)buf[0] << 8) | buf[1]); /* set the offset */
8202 
8203  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8204 }
8205 
8217 uint8_t mpu6500_set_accelerometer_y_offset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t offset)
8218 {
8219  uint8_t res;
8220  uint8_t buf[2];
8221 
8222  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8223  {
8224  return 2; /* return error */
8225  }
8226  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8227  {
8228  return 3; /* return error */
8229  }
8230 
8231  buf[0] = (offset >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set high */
8232  buf[1] = (offset >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set low */
8233  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_YA_OFFSET_H, buf, 2); /* write ya offset */
8234  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8235  {
8236  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write ya offset failed.\n"); /* write ya offset failed*/
8237 
8238  return 1; /* return error */
8239  }
8240 
8241  return 0; /* success return 0 */

8304  }

8367 uint8_t mpu6500_accelerometer_offset_convert_to_register(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, float mg, int16_t *reg)
8368 {
8369  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8370  {
8371  return 2; /* return error */
8372  }
8373  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8374  {
8375  return 3; /* return error */
8376  }
8377 
8378  *reg = (int16_t)(mg / 0.98f); /* convert real data to register data */
8379 
8380  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8381 }
8382 
8394 uint8_t mpu6500_accelerometer_offset_convert_to_data(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t reg, float *mg)
8395 {
8396  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8397  {
8398  return 2; /* return error */
8399  }
8400  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8401  {
8402  return 3; /* return error */
8403  }
8404 
8405  *mg = (float)(reg) * 0.98f; /* convert raw data to real data */
8406 
8407  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8408 }

8421 uint8_t mpu6500_set_gyro_x_offset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t offset)
8422 {
8423  uint8_t res;

8425 
8426  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */

8428  return 2; /* return error */
8429  }
8430  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8431  {
8432  return 3; /* return error */
8433  }
8434 
8435  buf[0] = (offset >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set high */
8436  buf[1] = (offset >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set low */
8437  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_XG_OFFSET_H, buf, 2); /* write xg offset */
8438  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8439  {
8440  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write xg offset failed.\n"); /* write xg offset failed*/
8441 
8442  return 1; /* return error */
8443  }
8444 
8445  return 0; /* success return 0 */

8496 uint8_t mpu6500_set_gyro_y_offset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t offset)
8497 {
8498  uint8_t res;
8499  uint8_t buf[2];
8500 
8501  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8502  {
8503  return 2; /* return error */
8504  }
8505  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8506  {
8507  return 3; /* return error */
8508  }
8509 
8510  buf[0] = (offset >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set high */
8511  buf[1] = (offset >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set low */
8512  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_YG_OFFSET_H, buf, 2); /* write yg offset */
8513  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8514  {
8515  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write yg offset failed.\n"); /* write yg offset failed*/
8516 
8517  return 1; /* return error */
8518  }
8519 
8520  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8521 }
8522 
8534 uint8_t mpu6500_get_gyro_y_offset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t *offset)
8535 {
8536  uint8_t res;
8537  uint8_t buf[2];
8538 
8539  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8540  {
8541  return 2; /* return error */
8542  }
8543  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8544  {
8545  return 3; /* return error */
8546  }
8547 
8548  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_YG_OFFSET_H, buf, 2); /* read yg offset */
8549  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8550  {
8551  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read yg offset failed.\n"); /* read yg offset failed*/
8552 
8553  return 1; /* return error */
8554  }
8555  *offset = (int16_t)(((uint16_t)buf[0] << 8) | buf[1]); /* set the offset */
8556 
8557  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8558 }
8559 
8571 uint8_t mpu6500_set_gyro_z_offset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t offset)
8572 {
8573  uint8_t res;
8574  uint8_t buf[2];
8575 
8576  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8577  {
8578  return 2; /* return error */
8579  }
8580  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8581  {
8582  return 3; /* return error */
8583  }
8584 
8585  buf[0] = (offset >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set high */
8586  buf[1] = (offset >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set low */
8587  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_ZG_OFFSET_H, buf, 2); /* write zg offset */
8588  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8589  {
8590  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write zg offset failed.\n"); /* write zg offset failed*/
8591 
8592  return 1; /* return error */
8593  }
8594 
8595  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8596 }
8597 
8609 uint8_t mpu6500_get_gyro_z_offset(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t *offset)
8610 {
8611  uint8_t res;
8612  uint8_t buf[2];
8613 
8614  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8615  {
8616  return 2; /* return error */
8617  }
8618  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8619  {
8620  return 3; /* return error */
8621  }
8622 
8623  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_ZG_OFFSET_H, buf, 2); /* read zg offset */
8624  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8625  {
8626  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read zg offset failed.\n"); /* read zg offset failed*/
8627 
8628  return 1; /* return error */
8629  }
8630  *offset = (int16_t)(((uint16_t)buf[0] << 8) | buf[1]); /* set the offset */
8631 
8632  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8633 }

8646 uint8_t mpu6500_gyro_offset_convert_to_register(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, float dps, int16_t *reg)
8647 {
8648  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8649  {
8650  return 2; /* return error */
8651  }
8652  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8653  {
8654  return 3; /* return error */
8655  }
8656 
8657  *reg = (int16_t)(dps / 0.0305f); /* convert real data to register data */
8658 
8659  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8660 }
8661 
8673 uint8_t mpu6500_gyro_offset_convert_to_data(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int16_t reg, float *dps)

8676  {

8678  }
8679  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8680  {
8681  return 3; /* return error */
8682  }
8683 
8684  *dps = (float)(reg) * 0.0305f; /* convert raw data to real data */
8685 
8686  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8687 }

8700 uint8_t mpu6500_set_motion_threshold(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t threshold)
8701 {
8702  uint8_t res;
8703 
8704  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8705  {
8706  return 2; /* return error */
8707  }
8708  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8709  {
8710  return 3; /* return error */
8711  }
8712 
8713  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_WOM_THR, (uint8_t *)&threshold, 1); /* write motion threshold */
8714  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8715  {
8716  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write motion threshold failed.\n"); /* write motion threshold failed*/
8717 
8718  return 1; /* return error */
8719  }
8720 
8721  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8722 }

8742  }

8744  {
8745  return 3; /* return error */
8746  }

8751  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read motion threshold failed.\n"); /* read motion threshold failed*/

8800  {

8805  return 3; /* return error */
8806  }
8807 
8808  *mg = (float)(reg) * 4.0f; /* convert raw data to real data */
8809

8811 }
8812 
8825 uint8_t mpu6500_self_test(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, int32_t gyro_offset_raw[3], int32_t accel_offset_raw[3])
8826 {
8827  uint8_t res;
8828  uint8_t prev;
8829  int32_t gyro_offset_raw_st[3];
8830  int32_t accel_offset_raw_st[3];
8831 
8832  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8833  {
8834  return 2; /* return error */
8835  }
8836  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8837  {
8838  return 3; /* return error */
8839  }
8840 
8841  res = a_mpu6500_get_st_biases(handle, gyro_offset_raw, accel_offset_raw, 0); /* get st biases */
8842  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8843  {
8844  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: get st biases failed.\n"); /* get st biases failed */
8845 
8846  return 1; /* return error */
8847  }
8848  res = a_mpu6500_get_st_biases(handle, gyro_offset_raw_st, accel_offset_raw_st, 1); /* get st biases */
8849  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8850  {
8851  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: get st biases failed.\n"); /* get st biases failed */
8852 
8853  return 1; /* return error */
8854  }
8855  res = a_mpu6500_accel_self_test(handle, accel_offset_raw, accel_offset_raw_st); /* accel self test */
8856  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8857  {
8858  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: accel self test failed.\n"); /* accel self test failed */
8859 
8860  return 1; /* return error */
8861  }
8862  res = a_mpu6500_gyro_self_test(handle, gyro_offset_raw, gyro_offset_raw_st); /* gyro self test */
8863  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8864  {
8865  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: gyro self test failed.\n"); /* gyro self test failed */
8866 
8867  return 1; /* return error */
8868  }
8869 
8870  prev = 1 << 7; /* reset the device */
8871  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, &prev, 1); /* write pwr mgmt 1 */
8872  if (res != 0) /* check the result */
8873  {
8874  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write pwr mgmt 1 failed.\n"); /* write pwr mgmt 1 failed */
8875 
8876  return 1; /* return error */
8877  }
8878  handle->delay_ms(100); /* delay 100ms */
8879  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read config */
8880  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8881  {
8882  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read power management 1 failed.\n"); /* read power management 1 failed */
8883 
8884  return 1; /* return error */
8885  }
8886  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear config */
8887  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_PWR_MGMT_1, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write config */
8888  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8889  {
8890  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write power management 1 failed.\n"); /* write power management 1 failed */
8891 
8892  return 1; /* return error */
8893  }
8894 
8895  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8896 }
8897 
8909 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_clock(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_clock_t clk)
8910 {
8911  uint8_t res;
8912  uint8_t prev;
8913 
8914  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8915  {
8916  return 2; /* return error */
8917  }
8918  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8919  {
8920  return 3; /* return error */
8921  }
8922 
8923  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c mst ctrl */
8924  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8925  {
8926  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst ctrl failed */
8927 
8928  return 1; /* return error */
8929  }
8930  prev &= ~0xF; /* clear the buffer */
8931  prev |= clk; /* set the clock */
8932  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c mst ctrl */
8933  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8934  {
8935  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c mst ctrl failed */
8936 
8937  return 1; /* return error */
8938  }
8939 
8940  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8941 }
8942 
8954 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_clock(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_clock_t *clk)
8955 {
8956  uint8_t res;
8957  uint8_t prev;
8958 
8959  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8960  {
8961  return 2; /* return error */
8962  }
8963  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8964  {
8965  return 3; /* return error */
8966  }
8967 
8968  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c mst ctrl */
8969  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8970  {
8971  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst ctrl failed */
8972 
8973  return 1; /* return error */
8974  }
8975  *clk = (mpu6500_iic_clock_t)(prev & 0x0F); /* get the clock */
8976 
8977  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8978 }
8979 
8991 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_multi_master(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
8992 {
8993  uint8_t res;
8994  uint8_t prev;
8995 
8996  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8997  {
8998  return 2; /* return error */
8999  }
9000  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9001  {
9002  return 3; /* return error */
9003  }
9004 
9005  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c mst ctrl */
9006  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9007  {
9008  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst ctrl failed */
9009 
9010  return 1; /* return error */
9011  }
9012  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
9013  prev |= enable << 7; /* set the bool */
9014  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c mst ctrl */
9015  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9016  {
9017  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c mst ctrl failed */
9018 
9019  return 1; /* return error */
9020  }
9021 
9022  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9023 }
9024 
9036 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_multi_master(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
9037 {
9038  uint8_t res;
9039  uint8_t prev;
9040 
9041  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9042  {
9043  return 2; /* return error */
9044  }
9045  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9046  {
9047  return 3; /* return error */
9048  }
9049 
9050  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c mst ctrl */
9051  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9052  {
9053  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst ctrl failed */
9054 
9055  return 1; /* return error */
9056  }
9057  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
9058 
9059  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9060 }

9073 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_wait_for_external_sensor(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
9074 {

9077 
9078  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9079  {
9080  return 2; /* return error */
9081  }

9084  return 3; /* return error */
9085  }

9090  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst ctrl failed */
9091 
9092  return 1; /* return error */
9093  }
9094  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear the settings */
9095  prev |= enable << 6; /* set the bool */

9100 
9101  return 1; /* return error */
9102  }

9105 }

9155 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_read_mode(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_read_mode_t mode)
9156 {
9157  uint8_t res;
9158  uint8_t prev;
9159 
9160  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9161  {
9162  return 2; /* return error */
9163  }
9164  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9165  {
9166  return 3; /* return error */
9167  }
9168 
9169  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c mst ctrl */
9170  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9171  {
9172  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst ctrl failed */
9173 
9174  return 1; /* return error */
9175  }
9176  prev &= ~(1 << 4); /* clear the settings */
9177  prev |= mode << 4; /* set the mode */
9178  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c mst ctrl */
9179  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9180  {
9181  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c mst ctrl failed */
9182 
9183  return 1; /* return error */
9184  }
9185 
9186  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9187 }
9188 
9200 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_read_mode(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_read_mode_t *mode)
9201 {
9202  uint8_t res;
9203  uint8_t prev;
9204 
9205  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9206  {
9207  return 2; /* return error */
9208  }
9209  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9210  {
9211  return 3; /* return error */
9212  }
9213 
9214  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c mst ctrl */
9215  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9216  {
9217  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst ctrl failed */
9218 
9219  return 1; /* return error */
9220  }
9221  *mode = (mpu6500_iic_read_mode_t)((prev >> 4) & 0x1); /* get the mode */
9222 
9223  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9224 }
9225 
9239 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_fifo_enable(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
9240 {
9241  uint8_t res;
9242  uint8_t prev;
9243 
9244  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9245  {
9246  return 2; /* return error */
9247  }
9248  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9249  {
9250  return 3; /* return error */
9251  }
9252 
9253  if ((slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) ||
9254  (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) ||
9255  (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2)
9256  ) /* slave0-2 */
9257  {
9258  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read fifo enable */
9259  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9260  {
9261  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read fifo enable failed.\n"); /* read fifo enable failed */
9262 
9263  return 1; /* return error */
9264  }
9265  prev &= ~(1 << slave); /* clear the settings */
9266  prev |= enable << slave; /* set the bool */
9267  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write fifo enable ctrl */
9268  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9269  {
9270  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write fifo enable failed.\n"); /* write fifo enable failed */
9271 
9272  return 1; /* return error */
9273  }
9274  }
9275  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave3 */
9276  {
9277  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c mst ctrl */
9278  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9279  {
9280  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst ctrl failed */
9281 
9282  return 1; /* return error */
9283  }
9284  prev &= ~(1 << 5); /* clear the settings */
9285  prev |= enable << 5; /* set the bool */
9286  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c mst ctrl */
9287  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9288  {
9289  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c mst ctrl failed */
9290 
9291  return 1; /* return error */
9292  }
9293  }
9294  else
9295  {
9296  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
9297 
9298  return 4; /* return error */
9299  }
9300 
9301  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9302 }
9303 
9317 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_fifo_enable(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
9318 {
9319  uint8_t res;
9320  uint8_t prev;
9321 
9322  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9323  {
9324  return 2; /* return error */
9325  }
9326  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9327  {
9328  return 3; /* return error */
9329  }
9330 
9331  if ((slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) ||
9332  (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) ||
9333  (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2)
9334  ) /* slave0-2 */
9335  {
9336  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_FIFO_EN, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read fifo enable */
9337  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9338  {
9339  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read fifo enable failed.\n"); /* read fifo enable failed */
9340 
9341  return 1; /* return error */
9342  }
9343  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> slave) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
9344  }
9345  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave3 */
9346  {
9347  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c mst ctrl */
9348  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9349  {
9350  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst ctrl failed */
9351 
9352  return 1; /* return error */
9353  }
9354  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 5) & 0x01); /* get the bool */
9355  }
9356  else
9357  {
9358  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
9359 
9360  return 4; /* return error */
9361  }
9362 
9363  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9364 }
9365 
9379 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_mode(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_iic_mode_t mode)
9380 {
9381  uint8_t res;
9382  uint8_t prev;
9383 
9384  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9385  {
9386  return 2; /* return error */
9387  }
9388  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9389  {
9390  return 3; /* return error */
9391  }
9392 
9393  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
9394  {
9395  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 addr */
9396  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9397  {
9398  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 addr failed */
9399 
9400  return 1; /* return error */
9401  }
9402  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
9403  prev |= mode << 7; /* set the bool */
9404  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv0 addr */
9405  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9406  {
9407  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv0 addr failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv0 addr failed */
9408 
9409  return 1; /* return error */
9410  }
9411  }
9412  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
9413  {
9414  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 addr */
9415  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9416  {
9417  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 addr failed */
9418 
9419  return 1; /* return error */
9420  }
9421  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
9422  prev |= mode << 7; /* set the bool */
9423  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv1 addr */
9424  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9425  {
9426  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv1 addr failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv1 addr failed */
9427 
9428  return 1; /* return error */
9429  }
9430  }
9431  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
9432  {
9433  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 addr */
9434  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9435  {
9436  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 addr failed */
9437 
9438  return 1; /* return error */
9439  }
9440  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
9441  prev |= mode << 7; /* set the bool */
9442  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv2 addr */
9443  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9444  {
9445  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv2 addr failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv2 addr failed */
9446 
9447  return 1; /* return error */
9448  }
9449  }
9450  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
9451  {
9452  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 addr */
9453  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9454  {
9455  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 addr failed */
9456 
9457  return 1; /* return error */
9458  }
9459  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
9460  prev |= mode << 7; /* set the bool */
9461  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv3 addr */
9462  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9463  {
9464  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv3 addr failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv3 addr failed */
9465 
9466  return 1; /* return error */
9467  }
9468  }
9469  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_4) /* slave4 */
9470  {
9471  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv4 addr */
9472  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9473  {
9474  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv4 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv4 addr failed */
9475 
9476  return 1; /* return error */
9477  }
9478  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
9479  prev |= mode << 7; /* set the bool */
9480  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv4 addr */
9481  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9482  {
9483  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv4 addr failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv4 addr failed */
9484 
9485  return 1; /* return error */
9486  }
9487  }
9488  else
9489  {
9490  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
9491 
9492  return 4; /* return error */
9493  }
9494 
9495  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9496 }
9497 
9511 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_mode(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_iic_mode_t *mode)
9512 {
9513  uint8_t res;
9514  uint8_t prev;
9515 
9516  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9517  {
9518  return 2; /* return error */
9519  }
9520  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9521  {
9522  return 3; /* return error */
9523  }
9524 
9525  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
9526  {
9527  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 addr */
9528  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9529  {
9530  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 addr failed */
9531 
9532  return 1; /* return error */
9533  }
9534  *mode = (mpu6500_iic_mode_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x1); /* get the mode */
9535  }
9536  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
9537  {
9538  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 addr */
9539  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9540  {
9541  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 addr failed */
9542 
9543  return 1; /* return error */
9544  }
9545  *mode = (mpu6500_iic_mode_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x1); /* get the mode */
9546  }
9547  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
9548  {
9549  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 addr */
9550  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9551  {
9552  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 addr failed */
9553 
9554  return 1; /* return error */
9555  }
9556  *mode = (mpu6500_iic_mode_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x1); /* get the mode */
9557  }
9558  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
9559  {
9560  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 addr */
9561  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9562  {
9563  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 addr failed */
9564 
9565  return 1; /* return error */
9566  }
9567  *mode = (mpu6500_iic_mode_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x1); /* get the mode */
9568  }
9569  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_4) /* slave4 */
9570  {
9571  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv4 addr */
9572  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9573  {
9574  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv4 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv4 addr failed */
9575 
9576  return 1; /* return error */
9577  }
9578  *mode = (mpu6500_iic_mode_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x1); /* get the mode */
9579  }
9580  else
9581  {
9582  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
9583 
9584  return 4; /* return error */
9585  }
9586 
9587  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9588 }
9589 
9603 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_address(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, uint8_t addr_7bit)
9604 {
9605  uint8_t res;
9606  uint8_t prev;
9607 
9608  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9609  {
9610  return 2; /* return error */
9611  }
9612  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9613  {
9614  return 3; /* return error */
9615  }
9616 
9617  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
9618  {
9619  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 addr */
9620  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9621  {
9622  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 addr failed */
9623 
9624  return 1; /* return error */
9625  }
9626  prev &= ~0x7F; /* clear the settings */
9627  prev |= addr_7bit & 0x7F; /* set the address */
9628  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv0 addr */
9629  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9630  {
9631  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv0 addr failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv0 addr failed */
9632 
9633  return 1; /* return error */
9634  }
9635  }
9636  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
9637  {
9638  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 addr */
9639  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9640  {
9641  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 addr failed */
9642 
9643  return 1; /* return error */
9644  }
9645  prev &= ~0x7F; /* clear the settings */
9646  prev |= addr_7bit & 0x7F; /* set the address */
9647  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv1 addr */
9648  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9649  {
9650  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv1 addr failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv1 addr failed */
9651 
9652  return 1; /* return error */
9653  }
9654  }
9655  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
9656  {
9657  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 addr */
9658  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9659  {
9660  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 addr failed */
9661 
9662  return 1; /* return error */
9663  }
9664  prev &= ~0x7F; /* clear the settings */
9665  prev |= addr_7bit & 0x7F; /* set the address */
9666  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv2 addr */
9667  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9668  {
9669  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv2 addr failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv2 addr failed */
9670 
9671  return 1; /* return error */
9672  }
9673  }
9674  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
9675  {
9676  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 addr */
9677  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9678  {
9679  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 addr failed */
9680 
9681  return 1; /* return error */
9682  }
9683  prev &= ~0x7F; /* clear the settings */
9684  prev |= addr_7bit & 0x7F; /* set the address */
9685  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv3 addr */
9686  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9687  {
9688  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv3 addr failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv3 addr failed */
9689 
9690  return 1; /* return error */
9691  }
9692  }
9693  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_4) /* slave4 */
9694  {
9695  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv4 addr */
9696  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9697  {
9698  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv4 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv4 addr failed */
9699 
9700  return 1; /* return error */
9701  }
9702  prev &= ~0x7F; /* clear the settings */
9703  prev |= addr_7bit & 0x7F; /* set the address */
9704  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv4 addr */
9705  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9706  {
9707  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv4 addr failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv4 addr failed */
9708 
9709  return 1; /* return error */
9710  }
9711  }
9712  else
9713  {
9714  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
9715 
9716  return 4; /* return error */
9717  }
9718 
9719  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9720 }
9721 
9735 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_address(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, uint8_t *addr_7bit)
9736 {
9737  uint8_t res;
9738  uint8_t prev;
9739 
9740  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9741  {
9742  return 2; /* return error */
9743  }
9744  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9745  {
9746  return 3; /* return error */
9747  }
9748 
9749  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
9750  {
9751  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 addr */
9752  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9753  {
9754  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 addr failed */
9755 
9756  return 1; /* return error */
9757  }
9758  *addr_7bit = prev & 0x7F; /* get the address */
9759  }
9760  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
9761  {
9762  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 addr */
9763  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9764  {
9765  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 addr failed */
9766 
9767  return 1; /* return error */
9768  }
9769  *addr_7bit = prev & 0x7F; /* get the address */
9770  }
9771  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
9772  {
9773  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 addr */
9774  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9775  {
9776  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 addr failed */
9777 
9778  return 1; /* return error */
9779  }
9780  *addr_7bit = prev & 0x7F; /* get the address */
9781  }
9782  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
9783  {
9784  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 addr */
9785  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9786  {
9787  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 addr failed */
9788 
9789  return 1; /* return error */
9790  }
9791  *addr_7bit = prev & 0x7F; /* get the address */
9792  }
9793  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_4) /* slave4 */
9794  {
9795  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_ADDR, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv4 addr */
9796  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9797  {
9798  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv4 addr failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv4 addr failed */
9799 
9800  return 1; /* return error */
9801  }
9802  *addr_7bit = prev & 0x7F; /* get the address */
9803  }
9804  else
9805  {
9806  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
9807 
9808  return 4; /* return error */
9809  }
9810 
9811  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9812 }
9813 
9827 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_register(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, uint8_t reg)
9828 {
9829  uint8_t res;
9830 
9831  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9832  {
9833  return 2; /* return error */
9834  }
9835  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9836  {
9837  return 3; /* return error */
9838  }
9839 
9840  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
9841  {
9842  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_REG, (uint8_t *)&reg, 1); /* write i2c slv0 reg */
9843  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9844  {
9845  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv0 reg failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv0 reg failed */
9846 
9847  return 1; /* return error */
9848  }
9849  }
9850  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
9851  {
9852  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_REG, (uint8_t *)&reg, 1); /* write i2c slv1 reg */
9853  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9854  {
9855  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv1 reg failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv1 reg failed */
9856 
9857  return 1; /* return error */
9858  }
9859  }
9860  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
9861  {
9862  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_REG, (uint8_t *)&reg, 1); /* write i2c slv2 reg */
9863  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9864  {
9865  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv2 reg failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv2 reg failed */
9866 
9867  return 1; /* return error */
9868  }
9869  }
9870  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
9871  {
9872  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_REG, (uint8_t *)&reg, 1); /* write i2c slv3 reg */
9873  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9874  {
9875  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv3 reg failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv3 reg failed */
9876 
9877  return 1; /* return error */
9878  }
9879  }
9880  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_4) /* slave4 */
9881  {
9882  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_REG, (uint8_t *)&reg, 1); /* write i2c slv4 reg */
9883  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9884  {
9885  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv4 reg failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv4 reg failed */
9886 
9887  return 1; /* return error */
9888  }
9889  }
9890  else
9891  {
9892  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
9893 
9894  return 4; /* return error */
9895  }
9896 
9897  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9898 }
9899 
9913 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_register(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, uint8_t *reg)
9914 {
9915  uint8_t res;
9916 
9917  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
9918  {
9919  return 2; /* return error */
9920  }
9921  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
9922  {
9923  return 3; /* return error */
9924  }
9925 
9926  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
9927  {
9928  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_REG, (uint8_t *)reg, 1); /* read i2c slv0 reg */
9929  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9930  {
9931  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 reg failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 reg failed */
9932 
9933  return 1; /* return error */
9934  }
9935  }
9936  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
9937  {
9938  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_REG, (uint8_t *)reg, 1); /* read i2c slv1 reg */
9939  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9940  {
9941  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 reg failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 reg failed */
9942 
9943  return 1; /* return error */
9944  }
9945  }
9946  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
9947  {
9948  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_REG, (uint8_t *)reg, 1); /* read i2c slv2 reg */
9949  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9950  {
9951  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 reg failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 reg failed */
9952 
9953  return 1; /* return error */
9954  }
9955  }
9956  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
9957  {
9958  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_REG, (uint8_t *)reg, 1); /* read i2c slv3 reg */
9959  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9960  {
9961  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 reg failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 reg failed */
9962 
9963  return 1; /* return error */
9964  }
9965  }
9966  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_4) /* slave4 */
9967  {
9968  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_REG, (uint8_t *)reg, 1); /* read i2c slv4 reg */
9969  if (res != 0) /* check result */
9970  {
9971  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv4 reg failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv4 reg failed */
9972 
9973  return 1; /* return error */
9974  }
9975  }
9976  else
9977  {
9978  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
9979 
9980  return 4; /* return error */
9981  }
9982 
9983  return 0; /* success return 0 */
9984 }
9985 
9999 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_data_out(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, uint8_t data)
10000 {
10001  uint8_t res;
10002 
10003  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10004  {
10005  return 2; /* return error */
10006  }
10007  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10008  {
10009  return 3; /* return error */
10010  }
10011 
10012  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10013  {
10014  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_DO, (uint8_t *)&data, 1); /* write i2c slv0 do */
10015  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10016  {
10017  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv0 do failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv0 do fail */
10018 
10019  return 1; /* return error */
10020  }
10021  }
10022  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
10023  {
10024  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_DO, (uint8_t *)&data, 1); /* write i2c slv1 do */
10025  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10026  {
10027  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv1 do failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv1 do fail */
10028 
10029  return 1; /* return error */
10030  }
10031  }
10032  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10033  {
10034  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_DO, (uint8_t *)&data, 1); /* write i2c slv2 do */
10035  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10036  {
10037  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv2 do failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv2 do fail */
10038 
10039  return 1; /* return error */
10040  }
10041  }
10042  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
10043  {
10044  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_DO, (uint8_t *)&data, 1); /* write i2c slv3 do */
10045  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10046  {
10047  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv3 do failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv3 do fail */
10048 
10049  return 1; /* return error */
10050  }
10051  }
10052  else
10053  {
10054  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
10055 
10056  return 4; /* return error */
10057  }
10058 
10059  return 0; /* success return 0 */
10060 }

10075 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_data_out(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, uint8_t *data)
10076 {
10077  uint8_t res;
10078 
10079  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10080  {
10081  return 2; /* return error */
10082  }
10083  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10084  {
10085  return 3; /* return error */
10086  }
10087 
10088  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10089  {

10091  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10092  {

10094

10096  }
10097  }

10099  {
10100  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_DO, (uint8_t *)data, 1); /* read i2c slv1 do */
10101  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10102  {
10103  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 do failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 do failed */
10104 
10105  return 1; /* return error */
10106  }
10107  }
10108  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10109  {
10110  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_DO, (uint8_t *)data, 1); /* read i2c slv2 do */
10111  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10112  {
10113  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 do failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 do failed */
10114
