10137 
10151 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_enable(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
10152 {
10153  uint8_t res;
10154  uint8_t prev;
10155 
10156  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10157  {
10158  return 2; /* return error */
10159  }
10160  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10161  {
10162  return 3; /* return error */
10163  }
10164 
10165  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10166  {
10167  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl */
10168  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10169  {
10170  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10171 
10172  return 1; /* return error */
10173  }
10174  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
10175  prev |= enable << 7; /* set the bool */
10176  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv0 ctrl */
10177  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10178  {
10179  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10180 
10181  return 1; /* return error */
10182  }
10183  }
10184  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
10185  {
10186  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl */
10187  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10188  {
10189  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10190 
10191  return 1; /* return error */
10192  }
10193  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
10194  prev |= enable << 7; /* set the bool */
10195  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv1 ctrl */
10196  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10197  {
10198  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10199 
10200  return 1; /* return error */
10201  }
10202  }
10203  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10204  {
10205  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl */
10206  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10207  {
10208  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10209 
10210  return 1; /* return error */
10211  }
10212  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
10213  prev |= enable << 7; /* set the bool */
10214  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv2 ctrl */
10215  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10216  {
10217  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10218 
10219  return 1; /* return error */
10220  }
10221  }
10222  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
10223  {
10224  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl */
10225  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10226  {
10227  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10228 
10229  return 1; /* return error */
10230  }
10231  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
10232  prev |= enable << 7; /* set the bool */
10233  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv3 ctrl */
10234  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10235  {
10236  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10237 
10238  return 1; /* return error */
10239  }
10240  }
10241  else
10242  {
10243  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
10244 
10245  return 4; /* return error */
10246  }
10247 
10248  return 0; /* success return 0 */
10249 }
10250 
10264 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_enable(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
10265 {
10266  uint8_t res;
10267  uint8_t prev;
10268 
10269  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10270  {
10271  return 2; /* return error */
10272  }
10273  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10274  {
10275  return 3; /* return error */
10276  }
10277 
10278  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10279  {
10280  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl */
10281  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10282  {
10283  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10284 
10285  return 1; /* return error */
10286  }
10287  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10288  }
10289  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
10290  {
10291  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl */
10292  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10293  {
10294  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10295 
10296  return 1; /* return error */
10297  }
10298  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10299  }
10300  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10301  {
10302  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl */
10303  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10304  {
10305  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10306 
10307  return 1; /* return error */
10308  }
10309  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10310  }
10311  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
10312  {
10313  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl */
10314  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10315  {
10316  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10317 
10318  return 1; /* return error */
10319  }
10320  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 7) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10321  }
10322  else
10323  {
10324  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
10325 
10326  return 4; /* return error */
10327  }
10328 
10329  return 0; /* success return 0 */
10330 }
10331 
10345 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_byte_swap(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
10346 {
10347  uint8_t res;
10348  uint8_t prev;
10349 
10350  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10351  {
10352  return 2; /* return error */
10353  }
10354  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10355  {
10356  return 3; /* return error */
10357  }
10358 
10359  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10360  {
10361  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl */
10362  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10363  {
10364  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10365 
10366  return 1; /* return error */
10367  }
10368  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear the settings */
10369  prev |= enable << 6; /* set the bool */
10370  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv0 ctrl */
10371  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10372  {
10373  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10374 
10375  return 1; /* return error */
10376  }
10377  }
10378  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
10379  {
10380  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl */
10381  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10382  {
10383  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10384 
10385  return 1; /* return error */
10386  }
10387  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear the settings */
10388  prev |= enable << 6; /* set the bool */
10389  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv1 ctrl */
10390  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10391  {
10392  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10393 
10394  return 1; /* return error */
10395  }
10396  }
10397  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10398  {
10399  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl */
10400  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10401  {
10402  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10403 
10404  return 1; /* return error */
10405  }
10406  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear the settings */
10407  prev |= enable << 6; /* set the bool */
10408  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv2 ctrl */
10409  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10410  {
10411  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10412 
10413  return 1; /* return error */
10414  }
10415  }
10416  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
10417  {
10418  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl */
10419  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10420  {
10421  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10422 
10423  return 1; /* return error */
10424  }
10425  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear the settings */
10426  prev |= enable << 6; /* set the bool */
10427  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv3 ctrl */
10428  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10429  {
10430  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10431 
10432  return 1; /* return error */
10433  }
10434  }
10435  else
10436  {
10437  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
10438 
10439  return 4; /* return error */
10440  }
10441 
10442  return 0; /* success return 0 */
10443 }
10444 
10458 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_byte_swap(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
10459 {
10460  uint8_t res;
10461  uint8_t prev;
10462 
10463  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10464  {
10465  return 2; /* return error */
10466  }
10467  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10468  {
10469  return 3; /* return error */
10470  }
10471 
10472  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10473  {
10474  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl */
10475  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10476  {
10477  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10478 
10479  return 1; /* return error */
10480  }
10481  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 6) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10482  }
10483  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
10484  {
10485  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl */
10486  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10487  {
10488  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10489 
10490  return 1; /* return error */
10491  }
10492  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 6) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10493  }
10494  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10495  {
10496  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl */
10497  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10498  {
10499  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10500 
10501  return 1; /* return error */
10502  }
10503  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 6) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10504  }
10505  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
10506  {
10507  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl */
10508  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10509  {
10510  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10511 
10512  return 1; /* return error */
10513  }
10514  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> 6) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10515  }
10516  else
10517  {
10518  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
10519 
10520  return 4; /* return error */
10521  }
10522 
10523  return 0; /* success return 0 */
10524 }
10525 
10539 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_transaction_mode(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_iic_transaction_mode_t mode)
10540 {
10541  uint8_t res;
10542  uint8_t prev;
10543 
10544  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10545  {
10546  return 2; /* return error */
10547  }
10548  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10549  {
10550  return 3; /* return error */
10551  }
10552 
10553  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10554  {
10555  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl */
10556  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10557  {
10558  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10559 
10560  return 1; /* return error */
10561  }
10562  prev &= ~(1 << 5); /* clear the settings */
10563  prev |= mode << 5; /* set the bool */
10564  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv0 ctrl */
10565  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10566  {
10567  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10568 
10569  return 1; /* return error */
10570  }
10571  }
10572  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
10573  {
10574  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl */
10575  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10576  {
10577  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10578 
10579  return 1; /* return error */
10580  }
10581  prev &= ~(1 << 5); /* clear the settings */
10582  prev |= mode << 5; /* set the bool */
10583  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv1 ctrl */
10584  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10585  {
10586  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10587 
10588  return 1; /* return error */
10589  }
10590  }
10591  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10592  {
10593  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl */
10594  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10595  {
10596  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10597 
10598  return 1; /* return error */
10599  }
10600  prev &= ~(1 << 5); /* clear the settings */
10601  prev |= mode << 5; /* set the bool */
10602  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv2 ctrl */
10603  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10604  {
10605  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10606 
10607  return 1; /* return error */
10608  }
10609  }
10610  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
10611  {
10612  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl */
10613  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10614  {
10615  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10616 
10617  return 1; /* return error */
10618  }
10619  prev &= ~(1 << 5); /* clear the settings */
10620  prev |= mode << 5; /* set the bool */
10621  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv3 ctrl */
10622  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10623  {
10624  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10625 
10626  return 1; /* return error */
10627  }
10628  }
10629  else
10630  {
10631  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
10632 
10633  return 4; /* return error */
10634  }
10635 
10636  return 0; /* success return 0 */
10637 }
10638 
10652 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_transaction_mode(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_iic_transaction_mode_t *mode)
10653 {
10654  uint8_t res;
10655  uint8_t prev;
10656 
10657  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10658  {
10659  return 2; /* return error */
10660  }
10661  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10662  {
10663  return 3; /* return error */
10664  }
10665 
10666  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10667  {
10668  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl */
10669  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10670  {
10671  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10672 
10673  return 1; /* return error */
10674  }
10675  *mode = (mpu6500_iic_transaction_mode_t)((prev >> 5) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10676  }
10677  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
10678  {
10679  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl */
10680  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10681  {
10682  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10683 
10684  return 1; /* return error */
10685  }
10686  *mode = (mpu6500_iic_transaction_mode_t)((prev >> 5) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10687  }
10688  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10689  {
10690  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl */
10691  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10692  {
10693  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10694 
10695  return 1; /* return error */
10696  }
10697  *mode = (mpu6500_iic_transaction_mode_t)((prev >> 5) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10698  }
10699  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
10700  {
10701  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl */
10702  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10703  {
10704  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10705 
10706  return 1; /* return error */
10707  }
10708  *mode = (mpu6500_iic_transaction_mode_t)((prev >> 5) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
10709  }
10710  else
10711  {
10712  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
10713 
10714  return 4; /* return error */
10715  }
10716 
10717  return 0; /* success return 0 */
10718 }
10719 
10733 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_group_order(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_iic_group_order_t order)
10734 {
10735  uint8_t res;
10736  uint8_t prev;
10737 
10738  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10739  {
10740  return 2; /* return error */
10741  }
10742  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10743  {
10744  return 3; /* return error */
10745  }
10746 
10747  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10748  {
10749  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl */
10750  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10751  {
10752  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10753 
10754  return 1; /* return error */
10755  }
10756  prev &= ~(1 << 4); /* clear the settings */
10757  prev |= order << 4; /* set the order */
10758  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv0 ctrl */
10759  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10760  {
10761  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10762 
10763  return 1; /* return error */
10764  }
10765  }
10766  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
10767  {
10768  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl */
10769  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10770  {
10771  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10772 
10773  return 1; /* return error */
10774  }
10775  prev &= ~(1 << 4); /* clear the settings */
10776  prev |= order << 4; /* set the order */
10777  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv1 ctrl */
10778  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10779  {
10780  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10781 
10782  return 1; /* return error */
10783  }
10784  }
10785  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10786  {
10787  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl */
10788  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10789  {
10790  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10791 
10792  return 1; /* return error */
10793  }
10794  prev &= ~(1 << 4); /* clear the settings */
10795  prev |= order << 4; /* set the order */
10796  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv2 ctrl */
10797  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10798  {
10799  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10800 
10801  return 1; /* return error */
10802  }
10803  }
10804  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
10805  {
10806  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl */
10807  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10808  {
10809  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10810 
10811  return 1; /* return error */
10812  }
10813  prev &= ~(1 << 4); /* clear the settings */
10814  prev |= order << 4; /* set the order */
10815  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv3 ctrl */
10816  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10817  {
10818  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10819 
10820  return 1; /* return error */
10821  }
10822  }
10823  else
10824  {
10825  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
10826 
10827  return 4; /* return error */
10828  }
10829 
10830  return 0; /* success return 0 */
10831 }
10832 
10846 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_group_order(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, mpu6500_iic_group_order_t *order)
10847 {
10848  uint8_t res;
10849  uint8_t prev;
10850 
10851  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10852  {
10853  return 2; /* return error */
10854  }
10855  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10856  {
10857  return 3; /* return error */
10858  }
10859 
10860  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10861  {
10862  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl */
10863  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10864  {
10865  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10866 
10867  return 1; /* return error */
10868  }
10869  *order = (mpu6500_iic_group_order_t)((prev >> 4) & 0x1); /* get the order */
10870  }
10871  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
10872  {
10873  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl */
10874  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10875  {
10876  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10877 
10878  return 1; /* return error */
10879  }
10880  *order = (mpu6500_iic_group_order_t)((prev >> 4) & 0x1); /* get the order */
10881  }
10882  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10883  {
10884  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl */
10885  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10886  {
10887  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10888 
10889  return 1; /* return error */
10890  }
10891  *order = (mpu6500_iic_group_order_t)((prev >> 4) & 0x1); /* get the order */
10892  }
10893  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
10894  {
10895  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl */
10896  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10897  {
10898  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
10899 
10900  return 1; /* return error */
10901  }
10902  *order = (mpu6500_iic_group_order_t)((prev >> 4) & 0x1); /* get the order */
10903  }
10904  else
10905  {
10906  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
10907 
10908  return 4; /* return error */
10909  }
10910 
10911  return 0; /* success return 0 */
10912 }
10913 
10928 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_transferred_len(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, uint8_t len)
10929 {
10930  uint8_t res;
10931  uint8_t prev;
10932 
10933  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
10934  {
10935  return 2; /* return error */
10936  }
10937  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
10938  {
10939  return 3; /* return error */
10940  }
10941  if (len > 0xF) /* check handle initialization */
10942  {
10943  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: len > 0xF.\n"); /* len > 0xF */
10944 
10945  return 5; /* return error */
10946  }
10947 
10948  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
10949  {
10950  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl */
10951  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10952  {
10953  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10954 
10955  return 1; /* return error */
10956  }
10957  prev &= ~0xF; /* clear the settings */
10958  prev |= len; /* set the len */
10959  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv0 ctrl */
10960  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10961  {
10962  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
10963 
10964  return 1; /* return error */
10965  }
10966  }
10967  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
10968  {
10969  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl */
10970  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10971  {
10972  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10973 
10974  return 1; /* return error */
10975  }
10976  prev &= ~0xF; /* clear the settings */
10977  prev |= len; /* set the len */
10978  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv1 ctrl */
10979  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10980  {
10981  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
10982 
10983  return 1; /* return error */
10984  }
10985  }
10986  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
10987  {
10988  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl */
10989  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10990  {
10991  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
10992 
10993  return 1; /* return error */
10994  }
10995  prev &= ~0xF; /* clear the settings */
10996  prev |= len; /* set the len */
10997  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv2 ctrl */
10998  if (res != 0) /* check result */
10999  {
11000  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
11001 
11002  return 1; /* return error */
11003  }
11004  }
11005  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
11006  {
11007  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl */
11008  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11009  {
11010  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
11011 
11012  return 1; /* return error */
11013  }
11014  prev &= ~0xF; /* clear the settings */
11015  prev |= len; /* set the len */
11016  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv3 ctrl */
11017  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11018  {
11019  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
11020 
11021  return 1; /* return error */
11022  }
11023  }
11024  else
11025  {
11026  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
11027 
11028  return 4; /* return error */
11029  }
11030 
11031  return 0; /* success return 0 */
11032 }
11033 
11047 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_transferred_len(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_slave_t slave, uint8_t *len)
11048 {
11049  uint8_t res;
11050  uint8_t prev;
11051 
11052  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
11053  {
11054  return 2; /* return error */
11055  }
11056  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
11057  {
11058  return 3; /* return error */
11059  }
11060 
11061  if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_0) /* slave0 */
11062  {
11063  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV0_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl */
11064  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11065  {
11066  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv0 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv0 ctrl failed */
11067 
11068  return 1; /* return error */
11069  }
11070  *len = prev & 0x0F; /* get the len */
11071  }
11072  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_1) /* slave1 */
11073  {
11074  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV1_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl */
11075  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11076  {
11077  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv1 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv1 ctrl failed */
11078 
11079  return 1; /* return error */
11080  }
11081  *len = prev & 0x0F; /* get the len */
11082  }
11083  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_2) /* slave2 */
11084  {
11085  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl */
11086  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11087  {
11088  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv2 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv2 ctrl failed */
11089 
11090  return 1; /* return error */
11091  }
11092  *len = prev & 0x0F; /* get the len */
11093  }
11094  else if (slave == MPU6500_IIC_SLAVE_3) /* slave2 */
11095  {
11096  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV3_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl */
11097  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11098  {
11099  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv3 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv3 ctrl failed */
11100 
11101  return 1; /* return error */
11102  }
11103  *len = prev & 0x0F; /* get the len */
11104  }
11105  else
11106  {
11107  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: invalid slave.\n"); /* invalid slave */
11108 
11109  return 4; /* return error */
11110  }
11111 
11112  return 0; /* success return 0 */
11113 }
11114 
11126 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_status(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t *status)
11127 {
11128  uint8_t res;
11129 
11130  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
11131  {
11132  return 2; /* return error */
11133  }
11134  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
11135  {
11136  return 3; /* return error */
11137  }
11138 
11139  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_STATUS, (uint8_t *)status, 1); /* read i2c mst status */
11140  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11141  {
11142  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst status failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst status failed */
11143 
11144  return 1; /* return error */
11145  }
11146 
11147  return 0; /* success return 0 */
11148 }
11149 
11162 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_delay_enable(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_delay_t delay, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
11163 {
11164  uint8_t res;
11165  uint8_t prev;
11166 
11167  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
11168  {
11169  return 2; /* return error */
11170  }
11171  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
11172  {
11173  return 3; /* return error */
11174  }
11175 
11176  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_DELAY_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c mst delay ctrl */
11177  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11178  {
11179  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst delay ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst delay ctrl failed */
11180 
11181  return 1; /* return error */
11182  }
11183  prev &= ~(1 << delay); /* clear the settings */
11184  prev |= enable << delay; /* set the bool */
11185  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_DELAY_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c mst delay ctrl */
11186  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11187  {
11188  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c mst delay ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c mst delay ctrl failed */
11189 
11190  return 1; /* return error */
11191  }
11192 
11193  return 0; /* success return 0 */
11194 }
11195 
11208 uint8_t mpu6500_get_iic_delay_enable(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic_delay_t delay, mpu6500_bool_t *enable)
11209 {
11210  uint8_t res;
11211  uint8_t prev;
11212 
11213  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
11214  {
11215  return 2; /* return error */
11216  }
11217  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
11218  {
11219  return 3; /* return error */
11220  }
11221 
11222  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_MST_DELAY_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c mst delay ctrl */
11223  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11224  {
11225  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c mst delay ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c mst delay ctrl failed */
11226 
11227  return 1; /* return error */
11228  }
11229  *enable = (mpu6500_bool_t)((prev >> delay) & 0x1); /* get the bool */
11230 
11231  return 0; /* success return 0 */
11232 }
11233 
11245 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic4_enable(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_bool_t enable)
11246 {
11247  uint8_t res;
11248  uint8_t prev;
11249 
11250  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
11251  {
11252  return 2; /* return error */
11253  }
11254  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
11255  {
11256  return 3; /* return error */
11257  }
11258 
11259  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv4 ctrl */
11260  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11261  {
11262  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv4 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv4 ctrl failed */
11263 
11264  return 1; /* return error */
11265  }
11266  prev &= ~(1 << 7); /* clear the settings */
11267  prev |= enable << 7; /* set the bool */
11268  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv4 ctrl */
11269  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11270  {
11271  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv4 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv4 ctrl failed */
11272 
11273  return 1; /* return error */
11274  }
11275 
11276  return 0; /* success return 0 */
11277 }

11328 {
11329  uint8_t res;

11331

11333  {
11334  return 2; /* return error */
11335  }

11337  {
11338  return 3; /* return error */
11339  }

11342  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11343  {
11344  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv4 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv4 ctrl failed */
11345 
11346  return 1; /* return error */
11347  }
11348  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear the settings */
11349  prev |= enable << 6; /* set the bool */
11350  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv4 ctrl */
11351  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11352  {
11353  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv4 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv4 ctrl failed */
11354 
11355  return 1; /* return error */
11356  }
11357 
11358  return 0; /* success return 0 */
11359 }

11409 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic4_transaction_mode(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, mpu6500_iic4_transaction_mode_t mode)
11410 {
11411  uint8_t res;
11412  uint8_t prev;
11413 
11414  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
11415  {
11416  return 2; /* return error */
11417  }
11418  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
11419  {
11420  return 3; /* return error */
11421  }
11422 
11423  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv4 ctrl */
11424  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11425  {
11426  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv4 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv4 ctrl failed */
11427 
11428  return 1; /* return error */
11429  }
11430  prev &= ~(1 << 5); /* clear the settings */
11431  prev |= mode << 5; /* set the mode */
11432  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv4 ctrl */
11433  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11434  {
11435  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv4 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv4 ctrl failed */
11436 
11437  return 1; /* return error */
11438  }
11439 
11440  return 0; /* success return 0 */

11492 uint8_t mpu6500_set_iic_delay(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t delay)
11493 {
11494  uint8_t res;
11495  uint8_t prev;
11496 
11497  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
11498  {
11499  return 2; /* return error */
11500  }
11501  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
11502  {
11503  return 3; /* return error */
11504  }
11505  if (delay > 0x1F) /* check the delay */
11506  {
11507  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: delay > 0x1F.\n"); /* delay > 0x1F */
11508 
11509  return 4; /* return error */
11510  }
11511 
11512  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* read i2c slv4 ctrl */
11513  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11514  {
11515  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv4 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv4 ctrl failed */
11516 
11517  return 1; /* return error */
11518  }
11519  prev &= ~0x1F; /* clear the settings */
11520  prev |= delay; /* set the delay */
11521  res = a_mpu6500_write(handle, MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV4_CTRL, (uint8_t *)&prev, 1); /* write i2c slv4 ctrl */
11522  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11523  {
11524  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: write i2c slv4 ctrl failed.\n"); /* write i2c slv4 ctrl failed */
11525 
11526  return 1; /* return error */
11527  }
11528 
11529  return 0; /* success return 0 */
11530 }

11559  {
11560  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read i2c slv4 ctrl failed.\n"); /* read i2c slv4 ctrl failed */
11561 
11562  return 1; /* return error */

11722 uint8_t mpu6500_read_extern_sensor_data(mpu6500_handle_t *handle, uint8_t *data, uint8_t len)
11723 {
11724  uint8_t res;
11725 
11726  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
11727  {
11728  return 2; /* return error */
11729  }
11730  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
11731  {
11732  return 3; /* return error */
11733  }
11734  if (len > 24) /* check handle initialization */
11735  {
11736  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: len > 24.\n"); /* len > 24 */
11737 
11738  return 4; /* return error */
11739  }
11740 
11741  res = a_mpu6500_read(handle, MPU6500_REG_EXT_SENS_DATA_00, (uint8_t *)data, len); /* read ext sens data 00 */
11742  if (res != 0) /* check result */
11743  {
11744  handle->debug_print("mpu6500: read ext sens data 00 failed.\n"); /* read ext sens data 00 failed */
11745 
11746  return 1; /* return error */
11747  }
11748 
11749  return 0; /* success return 0 */

11766 {
11767  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
11768  {
11769  return 2; /* return error */
11770  }
11771  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
11772  {
11773  return 3; /* return error */
11774  }
11775 
11776  return a_mpu6500_write(handle, reg, buf, len); /* write data */
11777 }

11804 }
11805 
11814 uint8_t mpu6500_info(mpu6500_info_t *info)
11815 {
11816  if (info == NULL) /* check handle */
11817  {
11818  return 2; /* return error */
11819  }
11820 
11821  memset(info, 0, sizeof(mpu6500_info_t)); /* initialize mpu6500 info structure */
11822  strncpy(info->chip_name, CHIP_NAME, 32); /* copy chip name */
11823  strncpy(info->manufacturer_name, MANUFACTURER_NAME, 32); /* copy manufacturer name */
11824  strncpy(info->interface, "IIC SPI", 8); /* copy interface name */
11825  info->supply_voltage_min_v = SUPPLY_VOLTAGE_MIN; /* set minimal supply voltage */
11826  info->supply_voltage_max_v = SUPPLY_VOLTAGE_MAX; /* set maximum supply voltage */
11827  info->max_current_ma = MAX_CURRENT; /* set maximum current */
11828  info->temperature_max = TEMPERATURE_MAX; /* set minimal temperature */
11829  info->temperature_min = TEMPERATURE_MIN; /* set maximum temperature */
11830  info->driver_version = DRIVER_VERSION; /* set driver version */
11831 
11832  return 0; /* success return 0 */
11833 }
MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_REG
#define MPU6500_REG_I2C_SLV2_REG
Definition: driver_mpu6500.c:89
MPU6500_REG_R_W
#define MPU6500_REG_R_W
Definition: driver_mpu6500.c:129
MPU6500_REG_SIGNAL_PATH_RESET
#define MPU6500_REG_SIGNAL_PATH_RESET
